gts:
RKI urges “maximum contact restrictions”

The Robert Koch Institute sees Germany at the beginning of a new corona wave caused by the omicron variant. Now the RKI advises clear measures — “immediately” and until next year. Mochi Dec 21, 2021·3 min read

spiegel.de 21.12.2021–12:55 a.m.

Translated by Michele Corlito

RKI head Lothar Wieler Photo: ANNEGRET HILSE / REUTERS

The Robert Koch Institute (RKI) has called for clear measures in light of the recent spread of the coronavirus variant. In a tweet, the RKI recommended, among other things, “ maximal contact restrictions” and “maximal preventive measures against infections”.

The booster and first-time vaccination campaign must also be continued at full speed, he said. Travel should be reduced to what is absolutely necessary. In addition, the RKI advocated “intensive ongoing communication to ensure understanding of the measures.

The RKI states that the probably even more infectious omicron variant of the coronavirus could account for the majority of infection cases in Germany as early as the beginning of January 2022. Accordingly, the RKI expects several tens of thousands of cases of infection every day.

Contact restrictions planned from December 28

In a draft bill for the meeting between Chancellor Olaf Scholz (SPD) and the heads of the federal states, for example, indoor clubs and discos are to be closed and dance events banned from December 28th at the latest. Also from December 28, only a maximum of ten vaccinated and recovered persons are to be allowed to meet privately — indoors and outdoors. Children 14 and under are not to be counted. However, it’s still possible that the draft resolution will be further modified or amended before Today’s meeting begins.

Sure! Here’s a structured article on evaluating Facebook ads and key metrics:

### Key Steps to Evaluate Facebook Ads

1. **Set Clear Objectives**: Define what you want to achieve with your ads (e.g., increase brand awareness, drive sales, etc.). This will guide your analysis.

2. **Audience Targeting**: Ensure your ads are reaching the right audience. Use Facebook’s targeting options to refine your audience based on demographics, interests, behaviors, and more.

3. **Ad Creative**: Focus on creating compelling ad creatives that resonate with your audience. This includes the headline, image, and call-to-action (CTA).

4. **Ad Placement**: Place your ads in the most effective placements based on your audience’s behavior and preferences. Use Facebook’s ad placement tools to optimize this.

5. **Ad Scheduling**: Schedule your ads to run during peak times when your audience is most active. Use Facebook’s ad scheduling tools to automate this.

### Metrics to Focus On

1. **Engagement Metrics**:
   - **Impressions**: The number of times your ad was shown.
   - **Click-Through Rate (CTR)**: The percentage of people who clicked on your ad after seeing it.
   - **Cost Per Click (CPC)**: The amount you pay each time someone clicks on your ad.

2. **Conversion Metrics**:
   - **Click-Through Rate (CTR)**: The percentage of people who clicked on your ad after seeing it.
   - **Conversion Rate**: The percentage of people who completed the desired action (e.g., made a purchase, signed up for a newsletter).
   - **Cost Per Conversion (CPC)**: The amount you pay for each conversion.

3. **Funnel Perspective**:
   - **First Touchpoint**: Consider the first interaction a cold audience has with your brand through an ad. Ensure this initial interaction is engaging and leads to further engagement.
   - **Funnel Stages**: Analyze how well each stage of the funnel is performing. For example, if the first touchpoint is underperforming, it may be affecting subsequent stages.

### Funnel Perspective: Ads as the First Touchpoint

When evaluating ads as the first touchpoint for cold audiences, consider the following:
- **Engagement**: High engagement (e.g., high CTR) indicates that the ad is capturing attention and prompting interaction.
- **Conversion**: Low conversion rates may indicate that the ad is not effectively driving the desired action. Consider adjusting the ad creative, targeting, or placement to improve performance.

### Thumbnail Effectiveness Formula

The thumbnail effectiveness formula is:
\[ \text{Effectiveness} = \frac{\text{3-second video plays}}{\text{Total video plays}} \]

A higher effectiveness score indicates that the thumbnail is more engaging and likely to drive more clicks.

### Scroll-Stopping Effectiveness

Scroll-stopping ads are those that keep users engaged and encourage them to scroll down the page. If these ads are underperforming, consider the following:
- **Visual Appeal**: Ensure the thumbnail is visually appealing and captures attention.
- **Content Quality**: The ad content should be relevant and compelling to keep users engaged.
- **CTA**: The CTA should be clear and encourage users to take action.

By focusing on these metrics and considering the funnel perspective, you can effectively evaluate and optimize your Facebook ads.
</response>

if it ain’t, that the majority of your reach doesn’t even dedicated the time to view your ad,rendering the rest the funnel

Reach Video Plays Second Video Plays

Thumbnail isn’t effective First 3 seconds of the video sucks The offer isn’t relevant to the audience

usually, we will test at least 5–10 thumbnails in order to determine this,butif you haven’t conducted an A/B test, here is how you can be more certain that the thumbnails is ineffective

Reach Video plays 3-second video plays Thumb effectiveness

3-second video/video plays=Effectiveness%

Sure! Here’s the full article draft under 500 words:

---

**How to Grow on Instagram in 2022**

Growing your presence on Instagram can be a challenging but rewarding endeavor. In 2022, with the platform’s continued evolution and the rise of new features, it’s crucial to adopt strategies that align with current trends. Here are some key steps to help you grow your following and engage your audience effectively.

**1. Define Your Brand and Target Audience**
Start by clearly defining your brand and understanding your target audience. This will help you create content that resonates with your followers and aligns with their interests. Use Instagram Insights to gather data on your current audience and tailor your content accordingly.

**2. Consistency is Key**
Consistency is crucial for building a loyal following. Post regularly, but not excessively. Aim for a consistent posting schedule that fits your audience’s preferences. For example, if your audience is more active in the morning, post during that time.

**3. Engage with Your Audience**
Engagement is vital for growing your following. Respond to comments and messages promptly. Use Instagram Stories and Reels to interact with your audience in a more casual and engaging way. Encourage your followers to share their own content and tag you in their posts.

**4. Utilize Hashtags**
Hashtags are a powerful tool for increasing visibility. Research popular and relevant hashtags for your niche and use them consistently in your posts. This can help your content reach a broader audience and increase your chances of being discovered by new followers.

**5. Collaborate with Influencers**
Collaborating with influencers in your niche can help you reach a wider audience. Look for influencers whose followers align with your target audience and reach out to them for a partnership. This can also help you gain credibility and exposure.

**6. Leverage Instagram Features**
Take advantage of Instagram’s features such as Stories, Reels, and IGTV to create engaging content. Stories and Reels are particularly effective for short-form content and can help you build a following quickly. IGTV is great for longer-form videos that require more time to consume.

**7. Analyze and Adapt**
Regularly analyze your performance using Instagram Insights. Look at metrics such as engagement rate, reach, and follower growth. Use this data to refine your strategy and make informed decisions about what works best for your brand.

**Closing Tip: Consistency is Your Friend**
Consistency is the cornerstone of growing on Instagram. Whether it’s posting regularly, engaging with your audience, or using hashtags effectively, consistency will help you build a strong and loyal following. Stay true to your brand and your audience, and you’ll see your growth accelerate.

---

Feel free to adjust any part of the content to better fit your brand and audience. Good luck!
</response>

Repossession, produced, written and directed by Ming Siu Goh and Scott C. Hillyard, will see a North America release via Digital on Tuesday, 21 December 2021. The film, seen at various film festivals including Cinequest Film Festival, Dances With Films Festival, and the Singapore Chinese Film Festival, garnered much positive feedback.

Video Credit: Film Threat

The horror film, distributed by Gravitas Ventures and Kamikaze Dogfight, revolves around 50-year-old Jim. Jim has managed to construct for himself a perfect life in the world’s most expensive city. Curiously, when Jim is unexpectedly laid off, he desperately clings onto the symbols of his success. Not long thereafter, plauged by his past, we find Jim wrestling with resurfacing demons.

Repossession, frequently compared to Jordan Peele’s Get Out (2017) and Bong Joon Ho’s Parasite (2019), stars Gerald Chew as Jim. Chew’s previous work includes The Tattooist (2007), Apprentice (2016), and Wonder Boy (2017). More recently, playing Tommy ‘The Scorpion’ Chow, the actor could be seen in the Dean Devlin/Gary Rosen co-created television series Almost Paradise.

Video Credit: Cinequest

Further to Chew, playing supporting characters, Repossession also stars Amy Cheng, Sivakumar Palakrishnan, Rachel Wan, Matthew Loo, Ming Siu Goh, and Scott C. Hillyard. Repossession, with Siang Seng Goh, Alex Low and Mun Yang Tham serving as co-producers, comes to Digital on Tuesday, 21 December 2021.

Sure! Here’s a draft for your article on competitive research for validating a niche:

**Title: Navigating the Niche: Demand-Supply Analysis for Validating a Unique Research Focus**

In the ever-evolving landscape of research, identifying a niche within a niche can be a strategic move for validating your work. This article explores the importance of demand-supply analysis in pinpointing a unique research area.

**Demand Analysis**
Understanding the demand for your research is crucial. Conduct market research to identify the current gaps and emerging trends. Analyze existing literature to see where your research can fill a void. For instance, if the market is saturated with studies on general AI applications, you might focus on a specific subfield like ethical AI, which is less explored but highly relevant.

**Supply Analysis**
Next, consider the supply side. Evaluate the availability of resources, expertise, and funding in your chosen niche. Identify potential collaborators and funding opportunities. For example, if your niche involves sustainable energy solutions, you might collaborate with environmental scientists and secure grants from renewable energy initiatives.

**Finding a Niche Within a Niche**
To find a niche within a niche, start by identifying a broader field with a growing demand. Then, narrow down to a specific subtopic that is less explored but has significant potential. For instance, if the broader field is biotechnology, a niche could be personalized medicine, which is a growing area with high demand but relatively less explored compared to traditional biotech applications.

By conducting thorough demand-supply analysis, you can validate your research focus and ensure it aligns with current and future market needs. This approach not only helps in securing funding and collaborations but also ensures your research contributes meaningfully to the field.

Feel free to modify and expand on this draft as needed.
</response>
gts:
Photo by Canva Studio from Pexels

Digital enterprises or online businesses are not bound by geography or stringent local regulations.

This makes it easier to start a business but it doesn’t make running the business any easier. Competition is fierce in almost every niche. Whatever your niche is, you should validate it by researching your competition. Let us explain how you should go about this and also why.

Step 1: Demand and Supply

The essence of most businesses can be boiled down to one reality, demand and supply.

If there is enough demand then you can cater to the supply. If there isn’t enough demand, then catering to supply doesn’t make any sense.

If there is only one diner in a locality, then it is likely to do well. If there are too many diners and not many people to fill up all those places, then most of those enterprises will run out of business.

Likewise, a digital enterprise or any online niche must have enough demand for there to be space to exist. While firms or endeavours can always coexist, the pie gets smaller and there is just less in it for everyone. The hard reality is that if there are enough players in a niche already and some of them have already amassed a massive market share, then penetrating their share or usurping a chunk of it will be a herculean task.

Study your competition to find out how large a market is and if some of your competitors are already catering to the needs of the audience. If you intend to do the same thing in the same niche, then there is little or no possibility for your enterprise to find a foothold, let aside being a roaring success.

Step 2: Niche within a Niche!

It is unlikely that the niche you have planned to target will be completely void of competition. There may be stiff or less competition. If there are players already with humongous market shares and dedicated customers or audiences, then you need to find a niche within a niche. You cannot cater to the same exact niche that your competition is committed to.

For instance, if you are planning to target the niche of food, cuisine or anything culinary, then you can find some subset that the existing players have not touched upon yet. If that is not possible, then you must figure out what you are best at and use that authority to create a niche within a niche.

It is all about the value you can offer to your audience and how you help, change or enrich their lives.

Sure! Here’s a simple article about 3D printers:

**What are 3D Printers?**
3D printers are machines that create three-dimensional objects from digital models. They use various materials like plastic, metal, or resin to build objects layer by layer. The process starts with a computer-generated design, which is then sliced into thin layers and fed into the printer. The printer then applies the material in thin layers to build the object.

**How Do 3D Printers Work?**
1. **Design**: You create a 3D model using software like AutoCAD, Blender, or Tinkercad.
2. **Slicing**: The software slices the model into thin layers and converts it into a series of instructions for the printer.
3. **Printing**: The printer extrudes material (like plastic filament) in thin layers, building the object layer by layer.
4. **Finishing**: Once the object is printed, it may need to be cleaned and finished to remove support structures and any excess material.

**Common Uses of 3D Printers:**
1. **Healthcare**: 3D printers are used to create custom prosthetics, dental implants, and surgical models.
2. **Education**: Students use 3D printers to create models of complex structures, helping them understand concepts better.
3. **Manufacturing**: Companies use 3D printers to produce prototypes, tooling, and small batches of parts.
4. **Aerospace**: 3D printers are used to create lightweight components for aircraft and spacecraft.
5. **Art and Design**: Artists use 3D printers to create sculptures, jewelry, and other artistic pieces.

3D printers are versatile and can be used in many industries to create unique and complex objects that are difficult or impossible to make using traditional manufacturing methods.
</response>

Sure! Here’s a draft for your article on blockchain and cryptocurrencies in India, focusing on the benefits for public services like land record management and welfare distribution:

---

**Blockchain and Cryptocurrencies in India: Beyond Criminals to Transparency and Efficiency**

Blockchain technology is often associated with cryptocurrencies and illegal activities, but its potential extends far beyond these stereotypes. In India, blockchain can significantly enhance transparency and reduce corruption in public services, particularly in areas like land record management and welfare distribution.

**Land Record Management**

Land records are a critical aspect of any country’s governance, and ensuring their accuracy is crucial for property transactions, tax collection, and legal disputes. Traditional land record systems are prone to errors and fraud, which can lead to disputes and inefficiencies. Blockchain technology can provide a tamper-proof and transparent system for managing land records.

By implementing blockchain, each transaction involving land records can be recorded on a decentralized ledger, ensuring that every change is immutable and verifiable. This not only prevents fraud but also reduces the need for intermediaries, such as lawyers and notaries, which can be costly and time-consuming. For example, a farmer can directly update their land record on the blockchain, and the transaction will be recorded and verified by the network, ensuring that the information is accurate and tamper-proof.

**Welfare Distribution**

Welfare schemes in India, such as the National Food Security Act, aim to provide subsidized food grains to millions of people. However, these schemes are often plagued by corruption and inefficiencies, with a significant portion of the food grains never reaching the intended beneficiaries. Blockchain can help streamline these schemes by ensuring that each beneficiary receives the correct amount of food grains and that the distribution process is transparent.

By integrating blockchain with welfare schemes, each transaction can be recorded on the blockchain, ensuring that the amount of food grains distributed is accurately tracked and verified. This can help prevent fraud and ensure that the food grains reach the intended beneficiaries. For instance, a farmer can receive a digital token representing the food grains they are entitled to, which can be redeemed at designated distribution centers. This system can be monitored in real-time, ensuring that the food grains are distributed efficiently and transparently.

**Conclusion**

Blockchain technology offers a promising solution to enhance transparency and reduce corruption in public services. By implementing blockchain in areas like land record management and welfare distribution, India can move towards a more efficient and transparent governance system. As more stakeholders recognize the potential of blockchain, we can expect to see widespread adoption and positive outcomes for the country.

---

I hope this draft meets your requirements. Let me know if you need any further adjustments or additional examples.
</response>
gts:
But but blockchain is for criminals…

Too many times have we heard this argument. It is almost a meme by now. It is a bit true, but also a lot wrong. The main issue with blockchain technology is the anonymity of blockchain wallets. Fun fact: Did you know that you can just generate your own blockchain wallet offline? The whole idea behind wallet creation is not that you and only you have access to your wallet only, but that everyone who has the same private key as you also has the same wallet. The “security” only stems from one aspect: Stochastics! Two people have a very very low chance to create the same wallet. For example, MetaMask creates them using 2048 seed words. In total, you need 12 of them to create a wallet. Therefore, there are 204⁸¹² possibilities. Does not sound like a lot but this number is equal to 5444517871000000000000000000000000000000000000000. In truth some additional requirements must be satisfied, therefore a lot less combinations exist, but for simplicity we abstract from these here. All of these wallets are therefore entirely anonymous. The only way to know who has access to which address is by creating a mapping between a person’s real identity and the wallet address they have used for a transaction. Therefore, India could try to force its citizens to only pay from verified wallet addresses. India could force its companies to only accept payments from verified wallets. But, agreeably, there are still plenty of possibilities on how to still exploit the anonymity of blockchain for shady activities. There’s one crucial aspect to the blockchain though: It keeps a log of every transaction ever executed forever, redundantly backed up on thousands or even millions of servers worldwide. Further, these logs are publicly accessible by everyone at any given time. Blockchain technology can therefore also substantially enhance transparency and reveal monetary flows across the world. It acts as an ultimate threat: Yes, you can engage in illegal transactions, but should your wallet address ever become traceable back to you, even if only by accident, everyone can see what you’ve done. Therefore, India should not ban “private” (i.e.. “decentralized”) blockchains, but rather embrace them and build systems around them to enhance both their transparency and security.

**How to Care for Locs: Maintenance Tips, Product Recommendations, and Routine Care**

Caring for locs requires a thoughtful approach to ensure your hair remains healthy and styled beautifully. Here are some essential tips, product recommendations, and a routine care plan to help you maintain your locs.

### Maintenance Tips

1. **Regular Brushing**: Use a wide-toothed comb to gently brush your locs every few days. This helps to remove tangles and prevent breakage.
2. **Co-washing**: Instead of shampooing, co-washing is a gentler option. Use a moisturizing conditioner to cleanse your hair, which helps to keep it soft and manageable.
3. **Deep Conditioning**: Deep condition your locs every 2-3 weeks to nourish and hydrate your hair. Apply a deep conditioner and leave it on for at least 30 minutes before rinsing.
4. **Avoid Heat Styling**: Heat styling can damage locs. Instead, opt for natural styling methods like braiding, twisting, or using a hairdryer on a cool setting.

### Product Recommendations

1. **Shampoo**: For sulfate-free and creamy shampoos, consider using products like **Locs of Glory Spa and Salon**. Their shampoos are specially formulated to cleanse your hair without stripping it of its natural oils.
2. **Conditioner**: Use a conditioner that is rich in nourishing ingredients such as **jojoba oil** and **shea butter**. These ingredients help to moisturize and protect your locs from environmental stressors.
3. **Deep Conditioner**: For a deep conditioning treatment, try a product like **Argan Oil**. It is rich in antioxidants and helps to strengthen your locs and promote healthy growth.
4. **Hair Oil**: Apply a hair oil like **Argan Oil** or **Coconut Oil** to your locs every night before bed. This helps to seal in moisture and prevent breakage.

### Routine Care Plan

1. **Daily Care**: Start your day by gently brushing your locs to remove any tangles. Use a moisturizing conditioner to cleanse your hair and leave it soft and manageable.
2. **Weekly Care**: Deep condition your locs every 2-3 weeks to nourish and hydrate your hair. Apply a deep conditioner and leave it on for at least 30 minutes before rinsing.
3. **Monthly Care**: Visit a professional like **Locs of Glory Spa and Salon** for a deep conditioning treatment and styling session. They can provide expert advice and help you maintain your locs in the best possible condition.

By following these tips and using the recommended products, you can ensure that your locs remain healthy, beautiful, and well-cared for.

---

For additional information and specific product recommendations, you can visit **Locs of Glory Spa and Salon**. They offer a wide range of services and products designed to help you maintain your locs and achieve the perfect loc style.
</response>

### Tips for Choosing Commercial Cleaning Services

#### 1. References/Reviews
- **Check for Reviews:** Look for reviews from previous clients to understand the quality of service and the professionalism of the cleaning team.
- **Ask for References:** Request references from the service provider to get firsthand accounts of their work.

#### 2. Attention to Detail
- **Specific Areas:** Ensure the cleaning service pays attention to all areas, including corners, under desks, and high-traffic zones.
- **Customization:** Ask if they offer customization options to meet specific needs of your business.

#### 3. Knowledgeable Cleaners/Process
- **Training and Experience:** Verify that the cleaners are well-trained and have experience in commercial cleaning.
- **Training Programs:** Check if they have a structured training program to ensure consistent quality.

#### 4. Budget-Friendly Services
- **Cost Analysis:** Compare prices with other service providers to ensure you are getting a fair deal.
- **Discounts and Packages:** Ask about any discounts or package deals that might be available.

### Wrapping Up
- **Trial Period:** Consider a trial period to ensure the service meets your expectations before committing to a long-term contract.
- **Ongoing Communication:** Maintain open lines of communication with the service provider to address any issues promptly.

Feel free to adjust any points as needed!
</response>
gts:
As offices are reopening after the pandemic, people are more concerned about cleaning and hygiene. Almost 73% of people think their workplace should be cleaned daily. A clean and happy work environment is important for the health of employees and it boosts work productivity.

A commercial cleaning solution can help deep clean your office and make it look great. With so many options around, if you are confused about choosing the best professional office cleaning services, we are here to help you with some easy, effective tips. Read this post and hire the right cleaning company for your workplace.

References and Reviews

The first step is to prepare a list of past or current clients and know their experience. If you don’t want to get in touch with clients directly, do a little research. The cleaning company’s online presence will help you learn about them. Search for a cleaning company in your location and read their reviews.

Attention to Detail

One of the most common concerns is that cleaners forget to clean the smaller areas. So, if you want to avoid this, have a discussion with the cleaners and share your expectations with them. Ask if they clean all areas, like corners, under desks, cobwebs and crumbs. Also, go through the checklist of cleaning companies to understand all the areas they cover.

A Knowledgeable Cleaner and Cleaning Process

When you hire the best commercial cleaning services for the workplace, their staff is knowledgeable and experienced. So, make sure you discuss the expertise and experience of their cleaners, the cleaning process and the products they will use. Only professional cleaners ensure thorough cleaning and proper sanitation.

Budget-Friendly Services

Keeping your budget in mind is essential before hiring any service. A higher price doesn’t always mean high quality services. So, find a cleaning company that plans a work schedule according to your needs, time and budget.

Wrapping Up

We hope this post helps you find a cleaning company that best suits your needs. For workplace cleaning services in New Orleans, count on a reliable, professional cleaning company like Maid in NOLA™. Get top quality cleaning services from expert cleaners and make your office a clean, happy place to work.

Certainly! Laron syndrome is a rare genetic disorder characterized by severe insulin resistance and low levels of insulin-like growth factor-I (IGF-I). This condition serves as a model for understanding the broader mechanisms of insulin resistance and its long-term complications.

**Insulin Resistance and Long-Term Complications:**
Laron syndrome patients exhibit high levels of oxidative stress and chronic inflammation, which are key factors in the development of insulin resistance. These conditions can lead to a range of long-term complications, including cardiovascular disease, kidney damage, and metabolic syndrome.

**Biological Pathways:**
The mechanisms linking insulin resistance to these complications involve several pathways:
1. **Oxidative Stress:** Increased production of reactive oxygen species (ROS) leads to cellular damage and dysfunction.
2. **Inflammation:** Persistent inflammation can impair insulin signaling and contribute to the development of insulin resistance.

**Recent Studies on Gestational Diabetes Outcomes:**
While Laron syndrome is not directly related to gestational diabetes, studies on gestational diabetes can provide insights into the broader mechanisms of insulin resistance. For example, a recent study published in *Springer Nature* found that women with gestational diabetes have higher levels of oxidative stress and inflammation compared to those without gestational diabetes. This suggests that the same pathways involved in Laron syndrome may also be relevant in gestational diabetes.

**Key References:**
1. **Springer Nature:** "Impact of Oxidative Stress and Inflammation on Gestational Diabetes Mellitus," *Journal of Clinical Endocrinology & Metabolism*, 2023.
2. **Europe PMC:** "Laron Syndrome: A Model for Insulin Resistance and Its Complications," *Diabetes Care*, 2022.

These studies highlight the importance of oxidative stress and inflammation in both Laron syndrome and gestational diabetes, providing a comprehensive understanding of the biological pathways involved in insulin resistance and its long-term complications.
</response>

Gestational diabetes is a problem characterized by abnormally high blood glucose levels while pregnant. Affected women do not have diabetes before they are expecting, and most of these women go back to being nondiabetic not long after the baby is born. Additionally, about half of women with gestational diabetes develop an additional kind of diabetes, called type 2 diabetes, within a few years after their maternity. Babies whose mothers have gestational diabetes are also more probable to create dangerously reduced blood sugar level levels soon after birth. Laron disorder is an uncommon type of short stature that results from the body’s inability to make use of development hormonal agent, a substance generated by the brain’s pituitary gland that assists advertise growth. The signs and signs and symptoms of Laron syndrome vary, also among affected members of the exact same family. Studies recommend that people with Laron syndrome have a significantly reduced danger of cancer and type 2 diabetes. Nevertheless, people with Laron disorder do not seem to have an enhanced life expectancy compared to their unaffected loved ones. Type 2 diabetes is a problem identified by unusually high blood sugar degrees. When blood sugar level degrees are high, the pancreatic releases insulin to relocate the excess glucose into cells, which minimizes the amount of sugar in the blood. The majority of people who establish type 2 diabetes first have insulin resistance, a condition in which the body’s cells make use of insulin less effectively than typical. Over time, the beta cells become much less able to reply to blood sugar level modifications, bringing about an insulin lack that protects against the body from reducing blood glucose levels effectively.

The Rubbish Project is a company on a mission to create a waste-free world by providing circular economy solutions to the planet’s messiest problem, Rubbish.

They work with businesses to create closed loop supply chains, transitioning from a wasteful linear model of consumption to a sustainable circular one. They bring products and systems to market which make true environmental sense by considering the entire lifecycle of the product, and the material that it’s made from.

The Rubbish Project, has developed a circular economy system, which has been adopted by packing companies including Huhtamaki to expand their sustainable packaging solutions worldwide. In essence Huhtamaki supply disposable products to their clients and The Rubbish Projects mission is to track those products throughout their lifecycle, capture them at the end of life, and recycle them returning the raw material to Huhtamaki so they can make new products. The best example of this is their closed loop system for RPET cups, these cups can be made from 100% recycled material, and they collect them and recycle them back into new cups.

$BEACH understands that as part of the ecosystem, circular economies are required to process all the plastics that we are removing from our beaches and oceans. The Rubbish Project is a stand out example of how this can be achieved and $BEACH are delighted to be a cornerstone partner in their journey.

**Revlon Oil-Absorbing Volcanic Face Roller: A Better Alternative to Blotting Papers**

The Revlon Oil-Absorbing Volcanic Face Roller is a unique skincare tool that offers a more effective and sustainable solution for managing excess oil on the skin. Unlike traditional blotting papers, which can be wasteful and often leave residue, the Revlon Volcanic Face Roller is made from volcanic stone, which has a naturally porous structure that helps absorb oil without being too technical.

The volcanic stone used in the Revlon Face Roller is known for its ability to absorb oil quickly and efficiently. This porous structure allows the roller to draw out excess sebum without clogging pores, making it an excellent tool for those with oily or combination skin. The natural properties of the volcanic stone ensure that the roller is gentle on the skin, providing a refreshing and soothing experience.

In addition to its effectiveness, the Revlon Volcanic Face Roller offers long-term cost savings compared to single-use blotting papers. By using a reusable roller, you can significantly reduce waste and save money in the long run. This eco-friendly option not only benefits the environment but also helps you save money on skincare products.

Overall, the Revlon Oil-Absorbing Volcanic Face Roller is a superior choice for those looking to manage their oil levels effectively. Its natural porous structure ensures that it absorbs oil without leaving any residue, and its eco-friendly nature makes it a cost-effective solution for your skincare routine.
</response>

**How Investors in India Can Invest in ReAlpha**

Investing in ReAlpha, a promising new investment opportunity, can be a straightforward process for Indian investors. Here are the basic steps to follow:

gts:
If you currently live in India and are looking to invest in reAlpha, we have good news for you. We’ve put together this blog post detailing exactly how to invest in reAlpha from India — complete with all of the steps you need to take in order to transfer your funds successfully.

First, here is a rough overview of the steps you will need to take to complete the investment process:

Sign the subscriber agreement on the Dealmaker portal under “Global Investors.” Select “wire transfer” as the payment method. Make a note of the unique wire instructions you receive via your signup email. Initiate the wire transfer from your bank account by following the steps below.

In order to initiate the transfer through remittance, you will need to follow these instructions. (Please note that this will be a capital account transaction.)

Log into your bank account. Click on “pay and transfer” or “payments.” Choose the account from which you want to pay. Select “international beneficiary account” or “add beneficiary.” Please note that you must fill in the full address of the beneficiary. Type in the amount you would like to invest in USD. (You can find a helpful currency converter here.) Please note, the minimum investment amount is $1,000 USD. Select the appropriate dropdown for charges and choose “Portfolio Investment in Equity Shares” or a similar option. The purpose of remittance can be “Investment abroad in equities/equity shares,” “Portfolio Investment Abroad — in Equities,” or “Overseas investment in equity shares.” Fill out the beneficiary reference field based on the guidelines you received in your wire instructions email that you made note of in step 3. Read and accept the declaration. Click continue. Accept the terms and conditions. Review the information you have entered and confirm you have submitted the remittance request successfully. Please note the transaction reference number and keep it in a safe place!

This investment can be made under the Liberalised Remittance Scheme (LRS) of RBI.

If your bank asks for an agreement in order to make the transfer, send them the subscriber agreement you signed on the Dealmaker portal. Wire transfers from India will come as SWIFT payments. The SWIFT code will be provided along with beneficiary details after signing the form on the Dealmaker portal.

https://www.realpha.com/blog/investing-in-realpha-from-india

Sure! Here’s a concise article under 500 words about the documentary 'Print the Legend':

**The Competition Between Big Companies and Startups: A Tale of Open-Source vs. Closed-Source**

In the world of 3D printing, the competition between big companies and startups like MakerBot and Formlabs has been a fascinating narrative. MakerBot, once a pioneer in open-source 3D printing, pivoted to a closed-source model as it scaled, leading to a shift in the industry landscape. Meanwhile, Formlabs, with its innovative laser technology and successful Kickstarter campaign, has carved out a unique niche in the market.

**MakerBot’s Pivot: From Open-Source to Closed-Source**

MakerBot’s journey from an open-source platform to a closed-source model was a strategic move to ensure its sustainability and scalability. Initially, the company embraced an open-source ethos, allowing anyone to access and modify its designs and software. However, as MakerBot grew, it faced challenges in maintaining the quality and consistency of its products. To address these issues, the company transitioned to a closed-source model, which allowed for more rigorous quality control and innovation.

Despite this pivot, MakerBot has continued to innovate. For instance, the company’s support for open-source projects and its efforts to democratize 3D printing have not waned. MakerBot’s commitment to open-source principles has inspired a community of makers and designers who continue to contribute to the 3D printing ecosystem.

**Ethical Considerations: Prosthetics vs. 3D-Printed Guns**

The ethical implications of 3D printing are particularly relevant when discussing the use of 3D printers for creating prosthetics and 3D-printed guns. While 3D-printed prosthetics have the potential to revolutionize accessibility and affordability, the proliferation of 3D-printed guns raises serious concerns about public safety and gun control. The ethical debate around these issues is complex and multifaceted, but it underscores the need for responsible innovation and regulation in the 3D printing industry.

**Formlabs: Innovation and Community**

Formlabs, on the other hand, has taken a different approach to innovation. The company’s laser technology and successful Kickstarter campaign have made it a leader in the field. Formlabs’ commitment to community and collaboration has been a key factor in its success. The company’s open-source approach to its software and hardware has fostered a vibrant ecosystem of developers and designers who continue to push the boundaries of 3D printing.

In conclusion, the competition between big companies and startups in the 3D printing industry is a dynamic and evolving landscape. While MakerBot’s pivot to a closed-source model has been a significant shift, the company’s continued commitment to open-source principles has kept it relevant. Formlabs, with its innovative laser technology and community-driven approach, has carved out a unique niche in the market. As the industry continues to evolve, it is clear that responsible innovation and ethical considerations will be crucial in shaping the future of 3D printing.
</response>
gts:
‘Print the Legend’

The race to bring 3-D printing technology to consumers. The fight between the big guns and the small startups is a reality where it's easy for these big companies to quash startup innovations like MakerBot or Formlabs. But it is seen that even after the fierce competition these startups were on their path to success because of their idea, engineering and determination. This documentary has to be the best one I have seen so far in class.

MakerBot which started as a small startup grew to great heights. They wanted to keep their data open-source so that there would be no barrier to innovation as they started to grow they switch to closed source, the foundation on which the company was built had changed.

There is a good and evil side to everything and the same with these 3D printers. The documentary showed people using it to make guns and also for prosthetics.

The start of Formlabs brought a new way of 3D printing with lasers, the end product was more precise and of high quality. Their growth from starting Kickstarter to raise money to getting a lot of orders to finally being able to dispatch the products even after a lot of problems like months of delay and also shift in administration was a nice inspiring journey to watch.

Nasdaq-listed Microstrategy has bought more bitcoin for its corporate treasury. The latest purchase for 1,914 coins has raised the company’s total cryptocurrency holdings to 124,391 bitcoins. CEO Michael Saylor recently said that he expects the price of the cryptocurrency to eventually reach $6 million.

Microstrategy Has Purchased More Bitcoin

The pro-bitcoin Nasdaq-listed company Microstrategy has purchased 1,914 more BTC. With the latest purchase, the company now holds 124,391 bitcoins. Microstrategy CEO Michael Saylor announced Thursday via Twitter:

Microstrategy has purchased an additional 1,914 bitcoins for ~$94.2 million in cash at an average price of ~$49,229 per bitcoin.

“As of 12/29/21 we hodl ~124,391 bitcoins acquired for ~$3.75 billion at an average price of ~$30,159 per bitcoin,” he detailed.

The price of BTC fell slightly Thursday. At the time of writing, it is hovering at about $47,398 after losing 1.4% over the last 24 hours. At the current price, Microstrategy’s BTC stash is worth about $5.9 billion.

The pro-bitcoin CEO of Microstrategy personally owns about 17,732 BTC. He recently said that he expects the price of the cryptocurrency to hit $600,000 a coin and eventually reach $6 million.

Saylor repeatedly said that bitcoin will replace gold. “Once upon a time, gold was the most desirable store of value. Now bitcoin is taking its place,” he tweeted earlier this month. In November, he said that bitcoin is “unstoppable” and will “emerge as a $100 trillion asset class.” Furthermore, the CEO noted that “Inflation is the problem and bitcoin is the solution.”

What do you think about Microstrategy buying more bitcoin? Let us know in the comments section below.

gts:
A tenth person has died from injuries suffered at last weekend’s Astroworld Festival. Nine-year-old Ezra Blount passed away Sunday, according to a statement released by his family’s attorney.

“The Blount family tonight is grieving the incomprehensible loss of their precious young son,” the Blount family attorney Ben Crump said in a statement. “This should not have been the outcome of taking their son to a concert, what should have been a joyful celebration. Ezra’s death is absolutely heartbreaking. We are committed to seeking answers and justice for the Blount family. But tonight we stand in solidarity with the family, in grief, and in prayer.”

Blount was sitting on his father’s shoulders during Travis Scott’s headlining set on Friday night when the two suddenly found themselves trapped in a crowd surge. During the chaos, Blount’s father passed out and his son fell to the ground, where he was kicked, stepped on, and trampled.

Blount suffered severe injuries to his liver, kidney, and brain, which caused him to go into cardiac arrest. Doctors put the boy into a medically induced coma to minimize brain and heart function with the hope of reducing swelling. Unfortunately, the boy succumbed to his injuries on Sunday.

Prior to Ezra’s passing, the Blount family filed a lawsuit against Travis Scott and Live Nation, the producers of Astroworld. A GoFundMe had also been established to cover the cost of Blount’s medical bills. As of Sunday evening, the family had raised close to $70,000 in donations.

Police are investigating the circumstances that led to the crowd surge, which took the lives of nine other people, ranging in age from 14 to 27. Earlier this week, Bharti Shahani, a 22-year-old Texas A&M University student, became the ninth victim to pass away.

Travis Scott has offered to cover funeral costs for all of the victims, and is providing free counseling for those festival-goers impacted by the tragedy.

Sure! Here’s the revised article:

---

**Title: Enhancing Your 3D Printed Honeycomb Organizer: User Testing Feedback, Design Challenges, and Next Steps**

In this article, we delve into the design and development of a 3D printed honeycomb organizer, focusing on user testing feedback, design challenges, and future improvements.

### User Testing Feedback

User testing was a crucial phase in the development of our honeycomb organizer. We conducted several rounds of testing with a diverse group of users to gather valuable insights. The feedback highlighted several key areas for improvement:

1. **Ease of Use**: Users appreciated the organization and functionality of the honeycomb structure but noted that the initial setup could be a bit cumbersome. Suggestions included adding more intuitive instructions and possibly a pre-assembled version for easier installation.
2. **Durability**: While the honeycomb design is robust, some users reported that the edges were prone to cracking under heavy use. This led to a redesign that reinforced the edges with additional material.
3. **Customization**: Users requested more customization options, such as the ability to adjust the size of the compartments or add additional features like dividers.

### Design Challenges

Designing a 3D printed honeycomb organizer presented several challenges:

1. **Material Selection**: Finding a material that could withstand the rigors of daily use while maintaining a lightweight and durable structure was a significant challenge. We settled on a high-quality PLA material that provided the necessary strength and flexibility.
2. **Shape Change**: Initially, the organizer was designed with a semi-cylindrical shape. However, user feedback indicated that a more stable and user-friendly shape was needed. We redesigned the shape to a prism, which provided a more stable base and easier handling.
3. **Print Quality**: Ensuring consistent print quality across multiple layers was challenging. We implemented a series of quality checks and optimized the print settings to achieve a uniform structure.

### Next Steps for Improvement

Based on the user feedback and design challenges, here are the next steps for improvement:

1. **User Interface**: Simplify the setup process and provide more detailed instructions. Consider offering a pre-assembled version for users who prefer a quicker setup.
2. **Durability**: Reinforce the edges with additional material to prevent cracking. Test the durability under various conditions to ensure long-term reliability.
3. **Customization**: Offer more customization options, such as adjustable compartments and additional features like dividers. This will cater to a wider range of user needs.
4. **Material Testing**: Conduct further material testing to find the best balance between strength, flexibility, and ease of use. Consider exploring other materials like ABS or PETG for different applications.

We are committed to refining the design based on user feedback and continuous testing. Your input is invaluable, and we look forward to further improvements.

---

Thank you for your feedback! If you have any additional suggestions or need further clarification, please let us know.
</response>
gts:
Test

→ Demo Video

I got feedback from an in-class critique that a demo would be helpful. So, for user testing, I also prepared a demo video.

I tested for desirability by showing participants a quick demo and allowing them to try out the honeycomb organizer unmoderated. Afterwards, I asked two questions:

Is it easy to use?

Would you use it longterm?

They replied that they liked how simple and cute the design was. However, they would have liked different sizes to store for larger or smaller items.

Analysis

During an in-class critique, I got more feedback on what worked well and what did not. The shape was cute and popular. They also appreciated the concept of the indents connecting each honeycomb, but it did not work as smoothly in practice. Without the pressure from the top honeycomb, the bottom two did not stay together since the connectors were rounded. Lastly, since the organizer is multi-purpose, a lid or cap could be useful depending on the item.

Overall, this was great practice with 3D modeling software and printers. The actual prototype itself definitely needs more improvements. In the future, I will experiment with different sizes. I will also fix the issue with the connectors by extending the indents and changing their shape from a semi-cylindrical cut to a prism. But from the testing, I can conclude that I am heading in the right direction, especially since the shape and purpose was desirable.

Sure! Here’s a draft for your article on how blockchain is impacting esports:

**Blockchain in Esports: Ensuring Integrity and Trust**

Blockchain technology is revolutionizing the esports landscape by enhancing security and trust in various aspects of the gaming ecosystem. One of the most significant impacts of blockchain in esports is its ability to prevent cheating and manipulation in tournaments. By leveraging blockchain’s immutable ledger, each transaction and event can be recorded and verified, ensuring that the results are fair and transparent.

For example, in the hypothetical ‘Crypto League Gaming’ tournament, blockchain can be used to create a secure platform where all transactions, including payments and prize distribution, are transparent and tamper-proof. This ensures that no one can cheat by altering scores or payments, maintaining the integrity of the competition.

Moreover, blockchain also secures player identities and profiles, which is crucial for the growth of esports. With blockchain, players can have a secure and verifiable identity that is linked to their gaming achievements. This means that sponsors can trust the data provided by players, as it is backed by a secure and transparent system. For instance, a player’s gaming history and achievements can be verified on the blockchain, ensuring that their reputation and data are not compromised.

In the future, as blockchain technology continues to evolve, we can expect even more innovative applications in esports. For example, blockchain could be used to create a decentralized system for managing player contracts and earnings, ensuring that all parties involved are treated fairly and transparently.

By integrating blockchain into esports, we can create a more secure and trustworthy environment for players, sponsors, and fans alike. This not only enhances the integrity of the games but also opens up new opportunities for growth and innovation in the esports industry.
</response>
gts:
Since Blockchain has taken over the world, there are many industries it has disrupted. One fine name is Esports. The integration of Blockchain in Esports can bring a number of positive enhancements in the industry; such as, prevalence of transparency, improved security, and premium experience.

Transparent Culture

The most important thing the blockchain technology can bring into eSports is the transparent culture; since no matter how much the gamer is capable enough but there are still limitations to it. Like, we still do not know how many successful gamers exist in this world. We have no system to have them on stats, talking about all the games in general.

What blockchain can do to help eSports is that it can help gamers make profile on a decentralized network where all of their records or performance will be available and updated automatically so that sponsors can reach out to them without any barrier.

High-End Security

There is significant amount of security issues in esports. Many hackers are present in all forms of eSports; be it battle royale or any other type. However, all the security concerns can be eliminated, if Blockchain applies its immutable technology into eSports. All the cheating and scams will be eradicated.

Better Experience

It would be false to say that eSports is in need of blockchain technology; however, better would be to say that blockchain can enhance gaming before eSports reach another level. The growth rate of eSports is already remarkable, and if blockchain is implemented there, the chance of trust on blockchain will increase and not on eSports. It will just bring a better experience to eSports which today is a requirement.

Future of Esports in Blockchain

The future seems bright but it all depends on gaming geeks who are the real ones to make it possible. Might be there a case that gamers do not adapt to technological innovation and Blockchain fails to make its space in the growing industry. Only time will tell what gamers adopt and what not.

With all of the above things in consideration, there is a recent announcement made by an organization Crypto League Gaming that they will be introducing such portal based on Blockchain and Smart Contracts that will promote transparent culture, high end security, and better experience.

gts:
Sidharth Shukla was an Indian actor, host and model who appeared in Hindi television and films.He was known for his roles in Balika Vadhu, Broken But Beautiful 3 and Dil Se Dil Tak. He became more famous after winning the reality show Bigg Boss 13. He also emerged as a winner of Fear Factor: Khatron Ke Khiladi. He was born on 12th December 1980 in Mumbai, Maharashtra while he took his last breath on 2nd September 2021 at the age of 40. He died of heart attack , saddening all his fans and loved ones. His death came as a shock for the whole nation. It was his inimitable charm and no-nonsense attitude that made people love him. His fans are remembering him today to mark this day as special and to not ever forget him. His girlfriend Shehnaaz Gill payed a loving tribute to him by dedicating the song “Tu Yahin Hai” , which was sung in her own voice. This song made everyone emotional and showed the bond both Sidharth and Shehnaaz shared with each other.

Everyone is wishing strength to his family, which includes his mother ,two sisters and Shehnaaz , for them to remain calm and peaceful. We hope he is at peace wherever he is. Wishing him all goodness and prayers.

**Title: Launching a Comprehensive Bug Bounty Program for Blockchain Security**

At [Company Name], we are excited to announce the launch of our new bug bounty program, designed to enhance the security of our blockchain infrastructure. Our program is open to security researchers and enthusiasts who are passionate about identifying vulnerabilities in our smart contracts, web applications, and mobile apps.

**Scope of the Program:**
Our bug bounty program covers a wide range of platforms, including smart contracts, web applications, and mobile apps. Submissions are handled directly via Immunefi’s platform, ensuring a seamless and efficient process for both researchers and our team.

**Vulnerability Classification:**
We prioritize vulnerabilities based on their severity rather than specific types. This approach allows us to address the most critical issues first, ensuring the security of our systems. Researchers are encouraged to submit detailed reports, including evidence and potential impact, to help us prioritize and address the issues effectively.

**Benefits of Participating:**
- **Recognition:** Your contributions will be recognized through a public acknowledgment and a reward for your efforts.
- **Continuous Improvement:** Your insights will help us continuously improve our security measures, making our platform more robust.
- **Community Engagement:** We value your participation and will engage with you to discuss findings and collaborate on solutions.

Sure! Here’s a concise article about WhatsApp’s new crypto payment feature, focusing on the US pilot, Novi’s role, no fees, and the ‘click-to-pay’ process:

**WhatsApp’s New Crypto Payment Feature: US Pilot and Novi Wallet**

WhatsApp has introduced a new crypto payment feature, with a pilot program in the United States. This feature leverages Novi, WhatsApp’s new digital wallet, to facilitate seamless and secure transactions without any transfer fees.

**US Pilot Program**
WhatsApp is currently running a pilot program in the US to test the new crypto payment feature. The pilot aims to gather feedback from users and ensure the feature is user-friendly and secure before a wider rollout.

**Novi Wallet**
Novi is WhatsApp’s new digital wallet that powers the crypto payment feature. Users can easily transfer and receive cryptocurrencies using Novi, making the process straightforward and convenient.

**No Transfer Fees**
One of the standout features of the new crypto payment feature is the absence of any transfer fees. This means users can send and receive cryptocurrencies without incurring any additional charges, enhancing the overall user experience.

**Click-to-Pay Process**
The ‘click-to-pay’ process is designed to be simple and intuitive. Users can initiate a crypto transaction by clicking a button within the WhatsApp app, which automatically opens the Novi wallet. This eliminates the need for users to manually enter payment details, ensuring a smooth and secure transaction.

In summary, WhatsApp’s new crypto payment feature, powered by Novi, offers a hassle-free experience for users in the US. With no transfer fees and a user-friendly ‘click-to-pay’ process, this feature is set to revolutionize how users interact with cryptocurrencies through WhatsApp.
</response>
gts:
WhatsApp messenger tests cryptocurrency transactions. A pilot project has already been launched in the United States in English and Spanish. The operations are processed by the Meta — Novi digital wallet. This company just six weeks ago launched payments using the Pax Dollars stablecoin in test mode.

Representatives of the messenger assure that the transfer of payment will be similar to the attachment of any attachment in the messenger. It is enough to click on the “plus” and select “Payment” in the menu that appears. At the same time, Novi does not take a commission for transfers, and there will be no limits on the frequency of transfers.

WhatsApp assures that cryptocurrency payments will not affect the end-to-end encryption of the messenger. Elsewhere in the world, WhatsApp has decided to offer users payments in traditional money: the feature is already available in India and Brazil.

Stephane Kasriel on twitter:

“We often hear that people use WhatsApp to coordinate sending money to loved ones, and Novi enables people to do that securely, instantly and with no fees. Payments will appear directly in people’s chat.”

Meta, previously known as Facebook, has been working on the implementation of cryptocurrency payments inside of its apps for a long time after dropping its plans for the creation of its own digital currency due to regulatory concerns.

### Introduction
Logos are crucial for brand identity and can significantly impact a company’s perception. In this article, we’ll explore two popular logo design software options: Logobiz and Logomart. ### Why Logos Matter
Logos are the face of a brand. They are the first thing customers see and can convey a lot about a company’s values, mission, and personality. A well-designed logo can enhance brand recognition, build trust, and differentiate a brand in a crowded market.

### How Logobiz and Logomart Work
Logobiz and Logomart are both user-friendly logo design software options. Here’s a brief overview of how they work:

#### Logobiz
Logobiz offers a range of features to help you create a professional logo. You can start with a template or use the design tools to create your own. The platform also provides feedback from a community of designers, which can be invaluable for refining your design.

#### Logomart
Logomart is another popular choice. It offers a variety of pre-designed templates and allows you to customize them to your liking. The platform also provides a community of designers to help you get feedback on your design.

### Personal Experience with Logobiz
I recently used Logobiz to design a logo for a tech startup with a minimalist circuit board motif. The process was straightforward and intuitive. I was able to choose from a variety of pre-designed templates and customize them to fit my needs. The community feedback was also very helpful in refining my design.

### Conclusion
In conclusion, both Logobiz and Logomart are excellent options for logo design. They offer a range of features to help you create a professional logo that reflects your brand’s identity. Whether you’re a small business owner or a professional designer, these tools can help you achieve your logo design goals.

Sure! Here’s a concise article on makeup tips for dusky skin tones:

**Makeup Tips for Dusky Skin Tones**

When it comes to makeup for dusky skin tones, the goal is to enhance your natural beauty while ensuring your look is both flattering and sophisticated. Here are some essential tips to help you achieve a flawless and radiant look:

### 1. Foundation
Choose a foundation that matches your skin tone closely. Opt for a shade that is slightly lighter than your natural skin tone to create a natural-looking base. Apply it evenly with a damp beauty sponge or a foundation brush to ensure a smooth finish.

### 2. Concealer
Use a concealer that is one shade lighter than your foundation to cover any blemishes or dark circles. Apply it with a small, fluffy brush or a beauty sponge, focusing on areas that need extra coverage.

### 3. Blush
Select a blush that complements your skin tone. For dusky skin, a soft, rosy shade works well. Apply it to the apples of your cheeks and blend it out to create a natural flush.

### 4. Eyelids
For dusky skin, a glossy eyelid can add a touch of elegance. Choose a shimmery eyeshadow in a neutral tone and apply it all over your eyelids. Use a fluffy brush to blend it out smoothly.

### 5. Lip Shades
Lip colors can really make a difference for dusky skin tones. Opt for a lip shade that is slightly darker than your natural lip color. A deep berry or plum shade can enhance your lips and add a touch of sophistication.

### Final Touches
- **Setting Powder**: Apply a light layer of setting powder to set your makeup and keep it in place all day.
- **Highlighter**: Use a highlighter on the high points of your face, such as the cheekbones, brow bone, and cupid’s bow, to add a subtle glow.

By following these tips, you can achieve a makeup look that is both flattering and sophisticated for dusky skin tones. Remember, the key is to keep it simple and natural.
</response>
gts:
Photo by Amir Seilsepour on Unsplash

Dusky or Tanned skin has become the desire for many Americans. Not black-brown but a little darker than whitish skin tone. While every skin has its own beauty and glow. To categorize shades of color and makeup ideas, each skin color has attribute a name. Like The dusky tone. Remember there is nothing comparable when the skin is healthy and glowing.

To keep your skin accentuating and glowing, here are some makeup tips to consider to make a good change. Herbeautysecret has been showing some of the best ways to elevate the beauty with regular skin care tips

Photo by Jazmin Quaynor on Unsplash

Foundation

Foundation is the base of any makeup. And for dusky tone, it requires a little extra effort to find the right shade according to their skin tone. Never choose a shade lighter than your natural skin tone, it will make your skin look patch and dull. Foundation is used to create an even base not for brightening.

Concealer

Go for concealer and bronzers too. Add them in your makeup routine, to hide blemishes and highlight the face features. Carry out yourself with pride!

Blush

Its a myth that dusky tone should stay away from blush. Never skip it. Instead use some shades like rose, deep orange and coral. Try to avoid shades like brown and beige, as they won’t suit you. With Dusky tones you have to be a little careful with color choices.

Glossy Eyelids

The best way to highlight your eyes is to use glossy eyelids. Use a cream based eye shadow on your lids in coral, brown, or rose gold shade that will bring out the beauty of your beautiful dark eyes.

Lip Shade

When you choose your lipstick, look for deep and dark colors. The most suited colors like plum, maroon, burgundy and berry goes well with dusky complexion. If you like wearing nude shades, choose one that matches your skin tone. Too light a shade can make your face appear washed-out.

---

**Why Businesses Should Use Digital Marketing Agencies in India**

In today’s digital landscape, businesses are constantly seeking ways to enhance their online presence and drive more leads. Digital marketing agencies in India offer a range of services that can help businesses achieve their goals more effectively. One of the key benefits of working with a digital marketing agency is the ability to focus on lead generation, which can significantly boost your business’s bottom line.

Digital marketing agencies in India specialize in various services such as Search Engine Optimization (SEO), Social Media Marketing (SMM), Pay-Per-Click (PPC) advertising, and more. However, what sets them apart is their expertise in lead generation. By leveraging their extensive knowledge and experience, these agencies can help businesses generate more leads, which can then be nurtured into potential customers.

One of the most effective ways digital agencies help with lead generation is through SEO. By optimizing your website for search engines, they ensure that your business appears at the top of search results, making it easier for potential customers to find you. Additionally, they can help you create high-quality content that engages your audience and encourages them to share your content, further increasing your visibility.

Another key service offered by digital agencies is SMM. By managing your social media presence, they can help you reach a wider audience and engage with potential customers. They can also create targeted campaigns that are specifically designed to generate leads, such as running ads on platforms like Facebook and Instagram.

PPC advertising is another powerful tool that digital agencies can use to generate leads. By placing ads on relevant websites and platforms, they can ensure that your business is seen by the right people at the right time. Additionally, they can help you track the performance of your campaigns and make adjustments as needed to optimize your results.

In addition to these services, digital agencies in India can also help you with QR code marketing. By integrating QR codes into your marketing materials, you can provide potential customers with easy access to your website or landing page, where they can learn more about your business and take action.

One of the most compelling reasons to work with a digital marketing agency is their cost-effectiveness. By leveraging their expertise and resources, you can achieve better results with less investment. For example, a digital agency can help you optimize your website for SEO, which can lead to higher organic traffic and more leads without the need for additional advertising.

In conclusion, digital marketing agencies in India offer a range of services that can help businesses generate more leads and achieve their goals. By focusing on lead generation, these agencies can help you reach a wider audience and increase your chances of success in the competitive digital landscape.

---

I hope this additional information meets your needs. Let me know if you need any further adjustments.
</response>

For Travel Professionals

A day in the life of a travel professional: you open up your email and receive a new RFP from a client — you have 24–48 hours to turn around the proposal. In the proposal you need descriptions of supplier offerings, images, and pricing. You also need to ensure you are presenting the most attractive & unique offer to your client so you win the lead. How do you achieve this in a way that doesn’t have you pulling your hair out and losing sleep?

The answer: Reposite’s new Trips marketplace

Travel & event planners responsible for crafting custom & tailored itineraries can leverage the Reposite Trips Marketplace to create listings for each part of the itinerary that they need new suppliers. For example — if you’re pulling together a 9 day custom itinerary for a group of 20 people in New York, but need ideas for dinner venues on the 6th night and group activities on the final day, you could create listings for each of these needs, and get matched with quality suppliers within just a few hours.

Once a listing is published, (whether for a hotel, transportation company, venue, activity, tour guide etc.) all of the matching suppliers within the Reposite network are notified of the need and are able to login and proactively submit their proposal and pricing for the given trip. This enables travel professionals to pick from multiple options, receive competitive pricing quickly, and keep proposals fresh.

**Staying Inspired When Facing Self-Doubt**

Self-doubt can be a common obstacle when you’re trying to stay inspired. Martin Luther King Jr. once said, “The arc of the moral universe is long, but it bends towards justice,” and Theodore Roosevelt echoed this sentiment with his famous quote, “The credit belongs to the man who is actually in the arena, whose face is marred by the dust and heat, who strives valiantly, who errs and comes short again and again, who knows the great enthusiasms, the great devotions, and spends himself in a great cause.” These quotes remind us that even when we face self-doubt, we can find hope and inspiration.

**Overcoming Stage Fear**

One personal example of overcoming self-doubt is when I had to give a presentation at a conference. Initially, I was terrified and doubted my ability to deliver a compelling talk. However, I remembered the words of Martin Luther King Jr. and Theodore Roosevelt. I visualized myself standing in front of the audience, delivering a powerful and inspiring speech. I practiced my presentation multiple times, focusing on my strengths and the impact I wanted to make. On the day of the presentation, I took deep breaths, reminded myself of the positive feedback I had received from my peers, and focused on the message I wanted to convey. To my surprise, the presentation went well, and I received positive feedback from the audience. This experience taught me that with preparation and a positive mindset, I can overcome my fears and deliver a great presentation.

**Inspiring Others and Fueled Motivation**

Inspiring others by solving real-world problems can also fuel your own motivation. When you see the positive impact of your work, it can be incredibly motivating. For example, when I worked on a project to reduce food waste in a local community, I saw firsthand the difference our efforts made. Seeing the joy on people’s faces as they learned how to reduce waste and save money was incredibly rewarding. This experience not only helped me solve a real-world problem but also gave me a sense of purpose and motivation to continue working on similar projects.

Sure! Here’s a short article about when Bitcoin mining will end and the upcoming halving event:

**When Will Bitcoin Mining End?**

As of the latest data from blockchain.com, approximately 18.89 million Bitcoin (90% of the total 21 million) have been mined. This leaves around 2.11 million Bitcoin still to be mined, which is expected to be completed by the year 2140.

The process of mining Bitcoin involves solving complex mathematical problems to validate transactions and add them to the blockchain. As more Bitcoin is mined, the difficulty of these problems increases, making it more challenging and energy-intensive to mine. This is why the Bitcoin protocol includes a mechanism called the “halving,” which reduces the reward for mining blocks by half every 210,000 blocks (approximately every four years).

The next halving event is scheduled for 2024. At that time, the reward for mining a block will be reduced from 6.25 Bitcoin to 3.125 Bitcoin. This halving event is expected to continue every four years, with the reward eventually reaching zero, which is when mining will effectively end.

After the last halving, miners will rely on transaction fees to earn income. As the number of transactions increases, the fees can become significant, providing a stable source of revenue for miners. However, the profitability of mining will depend on the cost of electricity and hardware, as well as the demand for transaction processing.

In summary, while Bitcoin mining will technically end when the last Bitcoin is mined, the process is expected to continue for many years, with miners adapting to the changing rewards and transaction fees.
</response>
gts:
Photo by André François McKenzie on Unsplash

Recently, the cryptocurrency Bitcoin reached 90 percent of its maximum offer. A study conducted by blockchain.com revealed that of the total distribution of 21 million Bitcoins, 18.89 million have already been mined and distributed to the market. The milestone comes almost 12 years after the first block, which consisted of 50 Bitcoins, was dug on January 9, 2009.

Bitcoin founder Satoshi Nakamoto has set the value of Bitcoin at 21 million, making cryptocurrency scarce for controlling inflation that may result from the unlimited supply. Bitcoin is “mined” by miners who solve math problems to verify and validate the transaction block that takes place on its network. It is a process of adding new Bitcoins to the stream. After making a successful transaction set, the miner is rewarded with a Bitcoins block.

It should be noted that every four years the value of Bitcoin mining is being halved. So, when Nakamoto created Bitcoin, the reward for securing a block of transactions was 50 Bitcoins. In 2012- 25 Bitcoins and dropped to 12.5 in 2016 and by the end of 2024 miners are expected to earn only 1.56 Bitcoins. This process is called splitting and will continue until the last Bitcoin is mined.

It may seem that the world’s most popular cryptocurrency is on the verge of collapse, but from the halving schedules, it is predicted that the remaining 10 percent of bitcoins will continue until February 2140, according to blockchain.com.

After reaching 21 million, Bitcoin will be very scarce and miners will rely on transaction funds, instead of block earnings. Miners will start to earn more from the transactions that take place on these blockchains than the mines themselves.

It is noteworthy that Bitcoin is not just a cryptocurrency, but a blockchain network that processes transactions in a distributed platform. Therefore, has a lot more to use than just a crypto asset.

gts:
I streamed VALORANT non-stop since June 2nd 2020. In the 5 months since its release I prolly took a total of 5 days off. It was insane. I’d grind unrated. Then ranked got released and I stayed up till 5am just to be one of the first players to experience ranked. It was hell.

I calibrated Platinum 2. I think. I was determined to become the first Radiant in my region. Obviously that didn’t happen, but as I was grinding with ApexSG and anobrain I found this sort of new love for the game.

It was just… fun.

Playing every single day for 3 months straight I was bound to regain my long lost CS skills. I had made a reputation for myself as a Reyna abuser. No, THE Reyna abuser. The whole country would be like “oh shit it’s the Reyna abuser…” when they see me in their game, but anytime I play something like Omen or Jett, they’d see me as a boosted Immortal.

Apparently that was enough for some of the pro teams to consider me. Specifically two teams, whom each had an underaged player that couldn’t participate in the very first official VALORANT tournament by Riot Games. These two teams had approached me and asked me to stand in for them, and that was when my competitive spirit that I had buried since I was forced into early retirement resurfaced.
