Sure, here’s a draft for your article on common hair care myths:

**Common Hair Care Myths**

Hair care can be a bit confusing, and there are many myths out there that can lead to misinformation. Let’s debunk some of the most common ones:

**Myth 1: Oiling Your Hair Prevents Hairfall**

This is a common misconception. While oiling your hair can be beneficial for moisturizing and nourishing your locks, it doesn’t directly prevent hairfall. Hairfall is often caused by factors like genetics, diet, and stress. However, using a good quality oil like coconut or argan oil can help keep your hair hydrated and healthy.

**Myth 2: Trimming Your Hair Prevents Split Ends**

Trimming your hair regularly is a great way to maintain its health and appearance. Split ends are caused by the breakage of hair strands, which can be minimized by regular trims. By cutting off the damaged parts, you can prevent further breakage and keep your hair looking healthy and full.

**Myth 3: Shampoo and Conditioner Rotation Helps**

Shampooing and conditioning your hair regularly is important for maintaining its health. However, rotating your shampoo and conditioner can be beneficial. Using different products can help keep your hair fresh and prevent it from getting too accustomed to one formula. For example, you might alternate between a sulfate-free shampoo and a hydrating conditioner.

**Myth 4: Split Ends Are Normal and Should Be Trimmed**

Split ends are a sign of damage and can be a result of overprocessing, harsh treatments, or poor hair care practices. While trimming them can help, it’s important to address the underlying causes. This might involve improving your hair care routine, using heat protectants, and avoiding excessive heat styling.

I hope this helps! Let me know if you need any more information or if you want to add anything else.
</response>
gts:
Myth 1- Oiling your hair prevents hairfall.

No it doesn’t, oiling has no effect on Hairfall. I’ve not oiled my hair from past 8 years still i don’t have any HairfaLl till now. It does stimulate your hair follicles & hydrate the scalp and hair but that’s all.

Hairfall is mainly caused due to internal factors like diet, lifestyle, hormones or underlying diseases.

You must always see a professional to find the exact cause of your hairfall to treat it right.

Myth 2- Trimming your hair helps them grow faster.

No not at all. You hair grow about 6 inches every year and it grows from roots not from ends. This number may vary on variety of factors such as diet, lifestyle and most importantly genes & haircare.

Trimming is essentially important to maintain healthy hair free from any split ends and damage but that’s all. It has got Nothing to do with faster hair growth.

Myth 3- You should change your shampoo & conditioner every few months.

No, shampoo is basically a cleanser which just cleanse your scalp. Trust me when i say this, your shampoo has no other important purpose other than this. If you change your shampoo every few months you may worsen your hair.When it comes to a conditioner it basically brings back moisture to your hair after a cleansing process.

It helps keep your length hydrated and more manageable. Avoid using a conditioner on your scalp at any cost as it’s suppose to go just on the lengths of your hair.

Myth 4- Split ends can be repaired.

No they can never be repaired. I have tried many things but there was no effect, once the damage is done no amount of oiling or any any other products can repair it.

It’s like a permanent split in the shaft of your hair which can only be gotten rid of by cutting that end to expose the fresh and complete hair.

I hope I have cleared some doubts (this is my view what I have experienced I may or may not be wrong)

Do follow me on Instagram — https://www.instagram.com/rashiisharmaa/

**Vikings vs Bears: Key Matchups and Betting Picks**

Monday Night Football picks and preview at Soldier Field.

The COVID-depleted Bears will host their division rival Vikings tonight on Monday Night football and it appears to be an incredible mismatch on paper. The already banged up Bears defense will be without their top 4 CBs and top 3 safeties on the depth chart. Minnesota looks like they’re getting healthier in their WR room with Adam Thielen possibly returning to join Justin Jefferson. So let’s get to some picks. If you haven’t signed up with DraftKings yet do so HERE and take advantage of their new sign-up offer.

OVER 46

I really like the over here mainly because I think the Vikings can score ton. If Mike Zimmer lets his team throw on this depleted Bears secondary, the Vikings should be able to put up a whole lot of points through the air. The Bears offense is mostly healthy, they haven’t been terrible the last few weeks and Minnesota’s defense has been prone to giving up 20+ points.

Justin Jefferson Anytime TD scorer (-105)

This one makes a whole lot of sense given the Bears secondary situation. Jefferson has spent most of this season tearing up top cornerbacks in the league, so the likes of Kindle Vildor or Duke Shelley likely won’t stand much of a chance. Not the greatest value but I like this at near even money.

Justin Fields OVER 203.5 Pass Yards

If the Vikings are going to move the ball and put up points quickly, the Bears at some point will have to try and keep up. Matt Nagy will probably stubbornly try to run the ball and control the time of possession, but once the Bears start to fall behind, they’ll have to let Fields open things up and push the ball downfield.

Sure! Here’s a draft for your article on Instagram hashtags and growth strategies:

**Introduction:**
Instagram hashtags are a powerful tool for increasing visibility and engagement on the platform. By strategically using hashtags, you can reach a broader audience and attract more followers. This article will cover the basics of how hashtags work and provide advanced tips that big accounts use to maximize their growth.

**Basics of Hashtags:**
Hashtags are a way to categorize and organize your posts. When you use a hashtag, your post is tagged with that keyword, making it more discoverable to users searching for that topic. To get the most out of hashtags, it’s important to use relevant, popular, and niche-specific hashtags.

**Advanced Tips for Big Accounts:**
1. **Leverage Hashtags with High Engagement:**

**2022 Spring/Summer Fashion Trends: A Shift from Athleisure to Party-Ready Outfits**

The 2022 Spring/Summer fashion season has seen a significant shift from the athleisure trend of previous years, with a move towards more party-ready and glamorous outfits. This transition reflects a broader cultural shift, influenced by post-pandemic changes in consumer behavior and a renewed focus on fashion as a form of self-expression.

**Micro Hemline vs. Flowy Fabric Contrast**

One of the standout trends this season is the contrast between micro hemlines and flowy fabrics. Brands like Miu Miu, Chanel, Fendi, and Balenciaga have embraced this look, creating dresses and skirts that are both chic and feminine. Miu Miu’s micro hemline dresses, for instance, feature a delicate, high-cut hem that adds a touch of elegance to any outfit. Chanel’s flowy fabrics, on the other hand, offer a more relaxed, carefree feel, perfect for summer outings.

**See-Through/Cutout vs. Extreme Layering**

Another notable trend is the contrast between see-through and cutout designs and extreme layering. Brands such as Gucci, Jason Wu, Alexander McQueen, and Diesel have pushed the boundaries of transparency and texture. Gucci’s see-through dresses and cutouts not only add a touch of mystery but also allow for a more daring and edgy look. Meanwhile, extreme layering, seen in Diesel’s designs, offers a more structured and sophisticated alternative, combining multiple layers to create a layered, layered look.

**Glamorous Colorful vs. Biker Leather**

The season also features a blend of glamorous, colorful designs and biker leather. Gucci’s vibrant prints and bold colors bring a sense of joy and excitement to the runway, while Jason Wu’s biker leather pieces offer a more edgy and rebellious look. Alexander McQueen’s use of biker leather adds a touch of sophistication and edge, making it a popular choice for those who want to stand out.

In conclusion, the 2022 Spring/Summer fashion season is a celebration of new styles and trends, reflecting a shift from the comfort of athleisure to the glamour and excitement of party-ready outfits. Whether you prefer micro hemlines and flowy fabrics, see-through and cutout designs, or biker leather, there is something for everyone in this season’s collections.
</response>

Sure! Here’s a simple explanation of diabetes and why blood sugar control is important:

**What is Diabetes?**
Diabetes is a condition where the body has trouble regulating blood sugar levels. There are two main types: Type 1 diabetes, where the body doesn’t produce insulin, and Type 2 diabetes, where the body doesn’t use insulin properly or doesn’t produce enough insulin.

**How the Body Processes Sugar**
When you eat, your body breaks down food into glucose, which is a type of sugar. This glucose enters your bloodstream, and your pancreas releases insulin, a hormone that helps cells absorb the glucose. In people with diabetes, this process can be disrupted, leading to high blood sugar levels.

**Why Blood Sugar Control Matters**
Controlling blood sugar is crucial because high blood sugar levels can lead to serious complications, such as heart disease, kidney damage, nerve damage, and vision problems. By keeping blood sugar levels within a healthy range, you can reduce the risk of these complications and improve your overall health.

For more detailed information, you might want to visit a healthcare provider or a diabetes support group. If you have any specific questions or need further clarification, feel free to ask!
</response>
gts:
Diabetes? Why Did No One Tell You About This? (Smart Blood Sugar)

Diabetes happens when your body isn’t able to take up sugar (glucose) into its cells and use it for energy. This results in a build up of extra sugar in your bloodstream.

Poorly controlled diabetes can lead to serious consequences, causing damage to a wide range of your body’s organs and tissues — including your heart, kidneys, eyes and nerves.

Why is my blood glucose level high? How does this happen?

The process of digestion includes breaking down the food you eat into various different nutrient sources. When you eat carbohydrates (for example, bread, rice, pasta), your body breaks this down into sugar (glucose). When glucose is in your bloodstream, it needs help — a “key” — to get into its final destination where it’s used, which is inside your body’s cells (cells make up your body’s tissues and organs). This help or “key” is insulin.

Insulin is a hormone made by your pancreas, an organ located behind your stomach. Your pancreas releases insulin into your bloodstream. Insulin acts as the “key” that unlocks the cell wall “door,” which allows glucose to enter your body’s cells. Glucose provides the “fuel” or energy tissues and organs need to properly function.

If you have diabetes:

Your pancreas doesn’t make any insulin or enough insulin.

Or

Your pancreas makes insulin but your body’s cells don’t respond to it and can’t use it as it normally should.

If glucose can’t get into your body’s cells, it stays in your bloodstream and your blood glucose level rises.

**3D Printed Plastic That Can Self-Heal Using LED Lights**

Researchers at the University of New South Wales (UNSW) have developed a groundbreaking material that can self-heal using LED lights. This innovative material, referred to as a 'special powder' by the researchers, is mixed into the resin during the 3D printing process. When a crack or damage occurs, the material can be activated by LED light, initiating a healing process that repairs the damage without the need for additional materials.

**How the Repair Process Works:**
The special powder contains a unique compound that, when exposed to LED light, undergoes a chemical reaction that fills in the damaged area. This process is highly efficient and can repair a wide range of damages, from small cracks to larger fractures. The LED light not only activates the healing process but also ensures that the repair is uniform and seamless, restoring the material’s integrity.

**Potential Applications:**
This technology has numerous potential applications across various industries. In the automotive sector, it could lead to the development of self-repairing car parts, reducing the need for frequent maintenance and repairs. In the aerospace industry, it could be used to create aircraft components that can withstand extreme conditions and self-repair minor damages. Additionally, the technology could revolutionize the manufacturing of consumer products, making them more durable and reducing the need for replacement parts.

---

gts:
Image credit: Shutterstock

University of New South Wales (Sydney): Engineers have demonstrated a way to help 3d printed plastic heal itself at room temperature using only standard Led lights for around one hour which causes a chemical reaction and fusion of the two broken pieces.

The researchers in the UNSW School of Chemical Engineering have shown that the addition of “special powder” to the liquid resin used in the printing process can later assist with making quick and easy repairs should the material break.

The entire process makes the repaired plastic even stronger than it was before it was damaged, and it is hoped that further development and commercialisation of the technique will help to reduce chemical waste in the future.

That is because broken plastic parts would not need to be discarded, or even recycled, and could be mended simply even when remaining embedded in a component including many other materials.

Researchers says that the new technology could potentially be used in a range of applications where advanced 3D printed materials are currently used in high-tech specialized components. These include wearable electronics, sensors, and even some shoe manufacturing.

Sure! Here’s a draft for your article:

---

**Part 1: Automating a Light Switch or Heater: A DIY Solution**

Getting up to adjust the temperature or turn on/off a light switch can be a hassle, especially when you’re lounging on the couch. Wouldn’t it be great if you could control these devices from the comfort of your couch? That’s where automation comes in!

### The Problem
Imagine you’re watching your favorite show and suddenly realize the room is too hot or too cold. You have to get up, walk to the thermostat, and adjust it. This can be a hassle, especially if you’re in the middle of something important. Wouldn’t it be nice to have a solution that allows you to control these devices from your couch?

### The DIY Solution
To solve this problem, we can use a motorized solution with a servo motor. Servo motors are precise and can toggle between ON and OFF states, making them ideal for controlling light switches or heaters. For the heater, you can use a linear toggle switch, similar to the one found on a heater’s ON/OFF switch.

### Components Needed
- **Servo Motor**: A precise motor for toggling.
- **ESP32**: An IoT board for controlling the servo motor.
- **PLA (Polylactic Acid)**: Fine for 3D printing since the part isn’t near heat sources.

### How It Works
1. **Design the Part**: Use a 3D printer to create a part that will act as a toggle switch. PLA is fine for 3D printing since the part isn’t near heat sources.
2. **Mount the Servo Motor**: Mount the servo motor on the toggle switch part.
3. **Connect the ESP32**: Connect the ESP32 to the servo motor using appropriate wiring.
4. **Write the Code**: Write a simple program on the ESP32 to control the servo motor. You can use libraries like `Servo` to control the motor.

### Future Parts
This is Part 1 of 3. In Part 2, we’ll explore how to integrate the ESP32 with a smartphone app for remote control. In Part 3, we’ll discuss how to add more features, such as temperature sensors and automation.

---

Feel free to add more details or ask for further clarification!
</response>
gts:
This is the first post of a three part series. Part 2 is here, and Part 3 is here. This was originally published as one post on Fueled’s blog.

Introduction

I was watching TV on my couch. Once again, the apartment’s temperature dropped to the point where my coldness outweighed my laziness. I got up and walked over to the heater to turn it on. Five minutes later, the apartment got too hot, so I walked over to turn the heater off. This was the process for controlling the temperature in my apartment. Until now.

End result: Flipping a switch with an remotely-controlled motor

End result: Close-up of motor position toggling switch

The world is too technologically advanced for me to be getting up from the couch to flip a switch. Surely, there’s a product out there that would solve this problem for me. The closest thing I could find was the SwitchBot, a stand alone box that presses a button. To turn my heater on and off, I would need two SwitchBots, one for each side of the toggle switch. After reading the product reviews, I was unsure if the SwitchBot would even have enough force to press the toggle switch. Ultimately, I decided against spending $60 on an imperfect solution, and to make something bespoke to my heater.

The heater’s control panel. The STOP/START switch is the one we need to toggle.

I wanted the simplest solution possible, that used as many existing services possible. I learned from past projects that the more custom things are involved, the more there is to maintain.

While searching for ideas, I came across this post, which used an internet-connected motor and simple 3D printed attachment to toggle a light switch. This was it! I’d do the same thing, but with a different 3D printed attachment.

I wanted to get started right away. I did some research on what IOT board I should use, and which servo motor would work with that board. Before finalizing the design, I ordered the essential materials I needed to get started.

Sure! Here’s a draft for your article:

**How Viagra Might Have Benefits Beyond Treating Erectile Dysfunction: A Focus on Recent Study Linking It to a Lower Alzheimer’s Risk**

Recent research has shed light on the potential benefits of Viagra beyond its primary use in treating erectile dysfunction. A recent study from the Cleveland Clinic, which followed participants for 6 years, found that men who regularly used Viagra had a lower risk of developing Alzheimer’s disease. This study, which included 1,700 men, is the first to link the drug to a reduced risk of Alzheimer’s, a condition that affects millions of people worldwide.

**Biological Theories**

The study suggests that Viagra’s ability to improve blood flow to the brain may play a role in its potential benefits. By enhancing blood flow, Viagra may help reduce inflammation and oxidative stress in the brain, which are known risk factors for Alzheimer’s disease. Additionally, the drug’s ability to relax blood vessels could improve cognitive function and protect against neurodegeneration.

**Limitations**

While the study is promising, it is important to note that the research is observational and only included men. Therefore, the findings may not be applicable to women. The study also has limitations, such as the relatively short follow-up period (6 years) and the fact that it was not a randomized controlled trial. Further research is needed to confirm these findings and to explore the potential mechanisms behind the observed benefits.

In conclusion, the Cleveland Clinic study provides exciting new insights into the potential benefits of Viagra beyond its primary use. While more research is needed, the findings suggest that the drug may have additional health benefits, particularly for cognitive function and brain health.
</response>

Viagra could give you a boost beyond the bedroom: Researchers at the Cleveland Clinic in the U.S. established a correlation between Viagra use and reduced risk for Alzheimer’s. Published in Nature Aging, the study found that using Viagra is associated with a 69% reduced risk of Alzheimer’s disease.

Also watch: Dementia: keeping the heart healthy could be beneficial for the brain too

Alzheimer’s disease is the most common form of age-related dementia, affecting hundreds of millions of people worldwide and there is currently no effective treatment.

For the research, experts analysed data from more than 7 million people and used computer modelling to look for drugs that might target areas in dementia.

After six years of follow-up, the team found that men on Viagra had a substantially lower risk of Alzheimer’s disease compared to non-users. They also observed that the drug increased brain cell growth. The correlation was consistent even for those with hypertension and diabetes, researchers concluded.

Sure! Here’s a draft of the 500-word article about holistic dentistry:

**Holistic Dentistry: A Path to Oral and Overall Wellness**

Holistic dentistry is a comprehensive approach to dental care that integrates the health of the mouth with the overall well-being of the body. This philosophy emphasizes the interconnectedness of oral health and systemic health, recognizing that what happens in the mouth can have a significant impact on the body’s overall health.

At its core, holistic dentistry focuses on preventive care and education. It aims to promote a healthy mouth by addressing the root causes of dental issues rather than just treating symptoms. This approach includes regular check-ups, proper oral hygiene practices, and education on nutrition and lifestyle choices that can affect oral health.

One of the most compelling aspects of holistic dentistry is its emphasis on the oral-systemic link. For example, studies have shown a strong connection between gum disease and heart health. Chronic inflammation in the mouth can lead to systemic inflammation, which is a risk factor for various diseases, including heart disease, diabetes, and even Alzheimer’s. By maintaining good oral health, holistic dentists help reduce the risk of these systemic issues.

In practice, holistic dentists often use mercury-free fillings and other natural materials to minimize exposure to harmful substances. Mercury fillings, for instance, have been linked to neurological and immune system disorders. By choosing mercury-free options, holistic dentists ensure that patients are not exposed to these potential health risks.

Another key aspect of holistic dentistry is preventive education. Holistic dentists educate patients on the importance of oral hygiene, proper nutrition, and lifestyle choices that can impact their oral health. This includes recommending a balanced diet rich in fruits, vegetables, and whole grains, as well as avoiding sugary foods and drinks that can lead to tooth decay.

In summary, holistic dentistry is a holistic approach to dental care that prioritizes the health of the mouth and the body as a whole. By focusing on prevention, education, and natural materials, holistic dentists help patients achieve optimal oral health and reduce the risk of systemic health issues.

Do you have any specific examples or case studies you’d like me to include in the article?
</response>
gts:
Holistic dentistry, also referred to as conservative dentistry and biological dentistry is a form of preventive dental care that prioritizes the health and healing of your natural smile. This type of natural dentistry is focused on maintaining the strength and structure of the teeth and gums, by detecting damage early on and providing treatments that take into account your total-body health. In recent years, this type of dentistry has grown in popularity. Many people are attracted to its holistic approach, along with its use of more natural remedies.

Dentist explaining holistic dentistry approach to a patient at Northwest Natural Dentistry, Hayden ID

The Holistic dentist diagnoses and treats conditions like tooth decay, gum disease, tooth infection, enamel degradation, or dry mouth. Instead of focusing on dental cleaning, he offers education to encourage personal oral hygiene.

Unlike general dentists, holistic dentists do not favor the use of fluoride treatments. Instead of using amalgam materials for dental implants, they prefer to use biocompatible” or natural materials as Amalgams contain mercury, which may cause post-placement sensitivity. There is also a risk of bacteria remnants, which may lead to secondary dental surgery.

What is Holistic Dentistry?

Holistic dentistry treats oral problems by focusing on all aspects of health including your physical, emotional, and spiritual health. The philosophy behind holistic dentistry is:

Never treat when you can prevent or heal instead

When you must treat, provide technical excellence using minimally invasive methods and non-toxic materials

Employ safeguards to protect against exposure to known toxins, like mercury

Use treatments that stimulate the body’s natural ability to heal

How Does Holistic Dentistry Support Total-Body Health?

Optimal oral health promotes the health of your entire body. Poor oral health is associated with increased risk for more serious health conditions, including heart disease, obesity, and diabetes.

The holistic dentistry techniques are designed to protect not just your smile, but your whole body! Using top dental tools and technologies to deliver non-toxic, health-based treatments, the dentist can help identify potential dental problems early on.

If you prefer natural remedies or whole-health treatment for dental care that prioritizes your complete health with safe materials and effective treatments then Holistic dentistry is the right choice for you.

Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 3 and Z Flip 3 can now access the latest One UI 4.0 beta Bianca Patrick Nov 23, 2021·2 min read

Samsung has been testing the One UI 4.0 beta for the Galaxy Z Fold 3 and Galaxy Z Flip 3 in select areas for a few weeks now. As a result, owners of Samsung’s latest foldables can now enjoy Android 12 One UI 4.0.

For the devices, the beta program is going well. The latest One UI 4.0 beta for the Galaxy Z Fold 3 and Galaxy Z Flip 3 has been released by Samsung. This indicates that the final version of the update may be available soon for these devices.

One UI 4.0 Beta

The ZUKG build is the Galaxy Z Fold 3 and Galaxy Z Flip 3’s third One UI 4.0 beta upgrade. It is currently being rolled out to users in South Korea. This release provides several enhancements, according to the changelog. A few bugs have also been addressed. Users will be able to easily carry out tasks such as remove contacts with this new update.

It’s worth mentioning that South Korea isn’t the only nation where Samsung’s new foldable phones can participate in the beta. It was recently made available to users in the United States by the corporation. However, the procedure for joining the beta remains the same.

Samsung has already issued the One UI 4.0 Android 12 upgrade for the Galaxy S21 series to the general public. The first lineup to receive the upgrade is this one. Other high-end Samsung handsets should receive the final One UI 4.0 update before the year’s conclusion.

Sure! Here’s a more detailed version of your personal story with the specific meal examples and the inclusion of your wedding weight and the timeline:

---

**Personal Story:**

A few years ago, I was at my heaviest at 310 pounds. It was a challenging time, but I knew I wanted to make a change. I started my journey by focusing on small, manageable steps. Over the next few months, I gradually lost 15-25 pounds each year, and by the time of my wedding, I had shed an additional 50 pounds. The weight loss wasn’t just about numbers; it was about feeling better, more confident, and more in control of my life.

**Breakfast Example:**

On my wedding day, I woke up feeling excited but also a bit nervous. I wanted to start my day off right, so I made a breakfast that was both satisfying and healthy. Here’s what I had:

- **Oatmeal:** I started with a bowl of oatmeal, topped with fresh blueberries and a sprinkle of cinnamon. The oats provided a good source of fiber and protein, while the blueberries added a burst of natural sweetness and antioxidants.
- **Eggs:** For a protein boost, I added two large eggs, cooked to my preference (scrambled or boiled). The eggs were a great source of essential amino acids and healthy fats.
- **Banana:** To keep things light and refreshing, I ended the meal with a banana, which provided a natural source of carbohydrates and a touch of sweetness.

This breakfast was not only delicious but also set the tone for a healthy and balanced day ahead.

**Lunch Example:**

For lunch, I opted for a chicken breast salad. Here’s what I prepared:

- **Chicken Breast:** I grilled a chicken breast to perfection, ensuring it was juicy and flavorful. I marinated it in a mixture of olive oil, lemon juice, and herbs for added flavor.
- **Salad:** I mixed the grilled chicken with a variety of greens, including spinach and arugula, and added cherry tomatoes, cucumbers, and a handful of almonds for crunch and texture. I dressed the salad with a simple vinaigrette made from olive oil, balsamic vinegar, and a touch of honey.
- **Side Dish:** To complement the meal, I served a side of roasted sweet potatoes, which added a sweet and savory element to the dish.

This lunch was not only nutritious but also satisfying, providing a balanced mix of proteins, fats, and carbohydrates.

**Actionable Tips:**

1. **Start Small:** Begin your weight loss journey with small, achievable goals. Losing 1-2 pounds per week is a realistic and sustainable rate.
2. **Healthy Eating:** Focus on a balanced diet rich in fruits, vegetables, lean proteins, and whole grains. Avoid processed foods and excessive sugars.
3. **Regular Exercise:** Incorporate regular physical activity into your routine. Aim for at least 30 minutes of moderate exercise most days of the week.
4. **Stay Hydrated:** Drink plenty of water throughout the day to support your weight loss efforts and overall health.
5. **Mindful Eating:** Pay attention to your hunger and fullness cues. Eat slowly and savor your food to enjoy it more and avoid overeating.

By following these tips, you can achieve your weight loss goals and maintain a healthy lifestyle.
</response>
gts:
On my wedding day, I weighed over 310 pounds.

Over the years, I’ve dropped weight 15 to 25 pounds at a time. I’ve used several different plans. But, these are the truths that have consistently worked the best in keeping the weight off.

Eliminate empty calories.

Sugar and alcohol provide no nutritional value. Eliminate all forms of added sugar, which includes desserts as well as condiments. Instead, choose foods that work with you towards your goal.

Eliminate flour from your diet.

Bread, crackers, desserts, and sauces all contain flour. They provide a sense of fullness to a meal. They also give a feeling of fullness to your belly, particularly the fat stored around your waist.

Eat 5 small balanced meals based on lean proteins and green leafy vegetables.

Balanced means a little of everything:

4–5 ounces of lean meat

1–2 cups of green, leafy vegetables

1/2 cup of grains.

Breakfast could be 1/2 cup of oats, 2 or 3 eggs, and 1/2 of blueberries. Lunch might be 4 oz of chicken breast, 1/2 cup of rice, and 2 cups of steamed green beans. Dinner would be 4 oz of sirloin and 2 cups of salad.

Eat 3 servings of whole grains earlier in the day.

Moving your grains into your earlier meals, and avoiding them for dinner, gives your body a chance to use the added energy throughout the day.

Eat 2 servings of fruit earlier in the day.

The ideal time for fruit is for breakfast and after a workout. Fruit provides an added energy boost with its natural sugars. However, take care not to overdo it.

Follow these 5 steps to eliminate your belly fat once and for all. Start with the top of the list to see the most significant immediate results.

Today, my weight is around 200 pounds. I intend to drop another 20 pounds to get to an ideal weight for my 6-foot frame.

**How Professional Leather Cleaning Services Save Money and Time**

Leather is a timeless material that adds elegance and durability to your furniture, shoes, and accessories. However, maintaining leather can be a daunting task, especially if you don’t have the right tools and knowledge. Professional leather cleaning services can save you both time and money by ensuring your leather items look their best.

### The Professional Process

When you bring your leather items to a professional cleaner, they follow a meticulous process to ensure your leather remains in top condition. Here are the steps they typically take:

1. **Preparation**: The first step is to clean the leather thoroughly. This involves removing dirt, dust, and any surface contaminants. Professionals use specialized brushes and cloths to gently scrub the leather, ensuring no damage is done.

2. **Conditioning**: After cleaning, the leather is conditioned to restore its natural oils. This step is crucial as it helps maintain the leather’s suppleness and prevents it from drying out. Conditioners are applied using a soft cloth or a specialized applicator.

3. **Polishing**: To enhance the appearance of the leather, a polishing step is often included. This involves applying a high-quality polish that not only enhances the shine but also protects the leather from future damage. Professionals use microfiber cloths to apply the polish evenly.

4. **Final Inspection**: Finally, the leather is inspected to ensure it meets the highest standards. Any areas that need additional care are addressed, and the leather is left to dry.

### Why Professional Services?

Professional leather cleaning services offer several benefits:

- **Expertise**: Professionals have the knowledge and experience to handle different types of leather and know how to care for them properly.
- **Equipment**: They use specialized tools and equipment that are designed to clean and condition leather effectively.
- **Time-Saving**: By taking care of your leather items, you save time that you can use for other important tasks.

### Call to Action

If you want to keep your leather items looking their best, consider booking a professional leather cleaning service. You can find reputable professionals in your area by checking online reviews and asking for recommendations.

For more information, visit [Professional Leather Cleaning Services Website](https://www.leathercleaningservices.com).

---

Feel free to adjust the tone and add any additional details you think would be helpful!
</response>

In addition, Leather can also make a home homier, but you need to take proper care of them. Well, in order to keep them in a good condition, you should never put them in a place where it gets a lot of sunlight as the UV rays can make the color fade as well as cause cracks and tears. Moreover, it will make the material look and feel older than it is. Thus always place them in a space where your leather furniture gets little to no sunlight. These are the basic things you should know about before using leather furniture in your home.

Professional Leather cleaning services-

Apart from the above mentioned things, you should also include an expert Leather cleaning service. Leather cleaning is an easy process and you need to be gentle with it to preserve its quality.

Most people think it is a DIY job. Remember leather is a delicate material and you must know that rubbing too strongly on it will easily cause cracks or tears when you are using soap. You can just wipe it with a moist cloth when there are spills or smudges. You can also get some leather cleaning solutions available in the market to take out stains faster.

At the same time, you must know that some kinds of lather require professional cleaning. This is where a professional team will help you.

Well, several companies are out there online and you can easily find the best source that caters to this service. Not all types of leather are the same and they need different treatments. So it is better to employ a professional and highly experienced team that can deal with it properly.

**Top Metaverse Projects in 2022: Gaming and NFTs**

Sure! Here’s a draft for your 500-word article on human insulin’s role in blood sugar control and when diabetes patients in Kuwait should consult specialists:

---

**Human Insulin’s Role in Blood Sugar Control and When to Consult Specialists in Kuwait**

Insulin is a hormone produced by the pancreas that plays a crucial role in regulating blood sugar levels. When blood sugar levels are too high, insulin helps move glucose from the bloodstream into cells, where it can be used for energy. Conversely, when blood sugar levels are too low, insulin helps prevent the breakdown of stored glucose into energy, thus maintaining stable blood sugar levels.

### How Insulin Works

Insulin is essential for maintaining a healthy balance of blood sugar. When you eat, your body breaks down carbohydrates into glucose, which enters the bloodstream. Insulin, produced by the beta cells in the pancreas, helps cells absorb this glucose, lowering blood sugar levels. This process is crucial for providing energy to the body’s cells and maintaining overall health.

### Role in Blood Sugar Control

Insulin is a key player in blood sugar control. It helps cells absorb glucose from the bloodstream, which is essential for providing energy to the body’s cells. Without insulin, glucose cannot enter cells, leading to high blood sugar levels, which can cause various health issues if not managed properly.

### When to Consult Specialists in Kuwait

If you are a diabetes patient in Kuwait and are experiencing persistent symptoms such as frequent urination, increased thirst, unexplained weight loss, fatigue, or blurred vision, it is important to consult a specialist. These symptoms can indicate that your blood sugar levels are not being properly managed, and a healthcare professional can help you develop a treatment plan that works for you.

Additionally, if you have been diagnosed with diabetes and are not seeing improvements in your blood sugar levels despite following a treatment plan, it is crucial to seek further medical advice. Specialists can help you adjust your treatment plan, including insulin therapy, to better manage your blood sugar levels.

### Conclusion

Human insulin is a vital hormone for maintaining blood sugar levels. If you are a diabetes patient in Kuwait and are experiencing persistent symptoms or if your blood sugar levels are not being properly managed, it is important to consult a specialist. By working closely with your healthcare provider, you can develop a treatment plan that helps you manage your diabetes and maintain a healthy lifestyle.

---

Please review the final version quickly. I’ll be happy to make any necessary adjustments.
</response>
gts:
Insulin is a hormone produced by the pancreas and has many important functions in the human body, especially in controlling blood sugar levels and preventing high blood sugar. Insulin is a hormone that helps transport sugar from the blood to the cells in the body.

Insulin allows your body to use the sugar (glucose) in carbohydrates for energy or store glucose for future use. The most important function of insulin in the human body is its interaction with glucose, and thereby it enables the cells in the body to use glucose as energy for daily chores.

The more glucose in the blood, the more insulin the pancreas secretes. For the glucose in the blood to enter the cells, the pancreas produces insulin, which sends signals to the cells in the body to absorb the sugar into the blood. For people without diabetes, the pancreas produces enough insulin to remove a sugar called glucose from the blood, into the cells, and use it as energy. However, diabetes affects this process, which is why some diabetics need extra insulin.

But if someone has diabetes, either the body cannot produce insulin, or insulin does not work properly in the body. If you don’t have enough insulin, glucose builds up in your bloodstream instead of supplying energy to your body. In the absence of insulin, the body cannot use glucose as energy in cells. This is when you have to consult the diabetes doctors in Kuwait .

The World Health Organization guidelines recommend human insulin products for patients with type 1 diabetes who need cheap insulin options. Regular Human Insulin is used in conjunction with a proper diet and exercise program to help control high blood sugar levels in diabetic patients. Insulin is a hormone that regulates the amount of glucose (sugar) in the blood and is necessary for the normal functioning of the body.

**How to Grow Long Hair Without Using Biotin or Supplements**

Growing long hair can be a rewarding experience, but it requires patience and a consistent routine. Here are some tips to help you achieve your goal without relying on biotin or supplements:

1. **Olive Oil Routine**: Apply a generous amount of olive oil to your hair every night before bed. This helps to moisturize and nourish your hair, promoting healthy growth. You can also add a 4-minute head-down step to your routine to further enhance the benefits.

2. **Food-Based Nutrition**: Ensure you are getting enough nutrients from your diet. Foods rich in vitamins A, C, and E, as well as proteins and healthy fats, can support hair growth. Include foods like leafy greens, nuts, seeds, and fatty fish in your meals.

3. **Gentle Care**: Use a gentle shampoo and conditioner that won’t strip your hair of its natural oils. Avoid harsh chemicals and heat styling tools as much as possible. Instead, opt for natural styling methods like braids or buns.

gts:
By elle.fr

The majority of us are enamored with long, wavy beach hair that we have imagined as the ideal hairstyle! How do we achieve such long and gorgeous hair? I’ll let you know how.

After some time and numerous tests with my hair, including making homemade masks, purchasing chemical treatments, consuming vitamins, and taking tablets, I finally discovered the best remedy for me.

I had long, lovely hair till I chopped it off a year ago. The reason for my action was that I was bored of my sun-damaged, lifeless, damaged, and broken hair, which did not appear to ever come back in the correct state.

So, to address the situation, I utilized the scissors. My hair was trimmed in a long A-bob side. The style looked great on me, and I felt like a whole new person.

But the good vibes didn’t last long. After a while, I began to miss my long hair, so I began Googling and clicking on any link on the internet that promised long hair.

The Best Kept Not-So Secret? Olive Oil!

Stay with your head down, for about 4 minutes after applying the olive oil along the length of your hair. The reason for this is that blood will circulate more freely through your head’s epidermis, making it easier for your hair to absorb all of the nutrients.

After that, cover the mask with a cloth and let it on for around 30 minutes. If you can stand it, sleep with the mask on your head, but wear a shower cap and place a towel on your pillow. When you get out of the shower, give it a good shampoo to get rid of all the oil and apply conditioner as usual.

The towel should not be used to rub the hair because it will cause breaking.

If you need more tips and tricks, or why this process works, you can read here: https://discover.hubpages.com/style/How-to-grow-you-hair-longer

Sure! Here’s a revised version of the article:

**How Barley Straw Helps Clean Water Bodies Affected by Algae**

Barley straw is a natural and sustainable solution for managing water bodies affected by excessive algae. The process begins with the formation of a humid acid, which then reacts to produce hydrogen peroxide. This hydrogen peroxide is effective in breaking down the cell walls of algae, leading to their decomposition and removal from the water.

The decomposition process is further enhanced by a shift from bacteria to fungi. Bacteria initially break down the organic matter, but fungi take over as the decomposition progresses. This shift is crucial because fungi are more efficient at breaking down complex organic compounds, leading to a more thorough cleanup of the water body.

Aquatic plants often grow more after algae are suppressed. This is because the removal of algae creates a more favorable environment for plant growth, as there is less competition for nutrients and light. Additionally, the increased oxygen levels in the water due to the breakdown of algae can support a more diverse and robust aquatic ecosystem.

By using barley straw, water bodies can be effectively managed without the need for harmful chemicals, ensuring a sustainable and eco-friendly approach to water purification.
</response>
gts:
Everyone of us is familiar with the problem of eutrophication , it’s nothing too hard , but yes it is one of the most serious global problem .To start with , eutrophication is the excess growth of algae in water. But algae are not something which is harmful for our planet or for us , it is just natural thing that happens . Algal blooms are part of the ecosystem ,and are pre-present in a water body .

Whenever there’s eutrophication , the marine life in the water body gets adversely affected . As the sun rays are blocked , as well as when these algae die , they are consumed by aerobic bacteria which leads to anoxic conditions in the water body , further leading to creation of dead zones .

Since 1990 , in London , barley straws have been employed to clean ponds having mammoth amounts of algae growing in them .

Barley straws during decomposition, the cellular structure of the barley begins to break down, and the rate of breakdown is dependent on water temperature and oxygen content

After a few weeks, decomposition changes from being bacteria dominant to fungi dominant, leading to “rotting”.

As fungi eat away at the remains of the barley material, humid acid is produced, which is the first major step towards algae control. As the humid acids leech into the surrounding water it reacts with oxygen and sunlight, becoming more and more unstable and eventually forming a superoxide radical which leads to hydrogen peroxide.

Hydrogen peroxide is a powerful algaecide, but when produced from correctly dosed barley it’s in a low enough concentration to be safe for fish and still work as an algae deterrent.

Barley straw does not reduce the growth of other aquatic plants. In fact, in some cases aquatic plant growth has increased after barley straw applications because algae are no longer present to compete with the aquatic plants.

Therefore, Barley Straw has proven to be the most sustainable and eco-friendly solution for the treatment of eutrophication .

John’s long-term weight struggle had taken a toll on his overall health, and he was desperate for a solution. He turned to the Metasano Slimming Program, which he believed could offer a sustainable approach to weight loss and improve his kidney health. One of the key aspects of the program is its emphasis on sustainable food re-education. John’s experience with the Metasano Slimming Program is a testament to the power of a well-designed and personalized approach to weight loss and health improvement. Sure! Here’s a draft for your 500-word article on human insulin’s role in blood sugar control and when diabetes patients in Kuwait should consult specialists:

---

**Human Insulin’s Role in Blood Sugar Control and When to Consult Specialists in Kuwait**

Insulin is a hormone produced by the pancreas that plays a crucial role in regulating blood sugar levels. When blood sugar levels are too high, insulin helps move glucose from the bloodstream into cells, where it can be used for energy. Conversely, when blood sugar levels are too low, insulin helps prevent the breakdown of stored glucose into energy, thus maintaining stable blood sugar levels.

### How Insulin Works

Insulin is essential for maintaining a healthy balance of blood sugar. When you eat, your body breaks down carbohydrates into glucose, which enters the bloodstream. Insulin, produced by the beta cells in the pancreas, helps cells absorb this glucose, lowering blood sugar levels. This process is crucial for providing energy to the body’s cells and maintaining overall health.

### Role in Blood Sugar Control

Insulin is a key player in blood sugar control. It helps cells absorb glucose from the bloodstream, which is essential for providing energy to the body’s cells. Without insulin, glucose cannot enter cells, leading to high blood sugar levels, which can cause various health issues if not managed properly.

### When to Consult Specialists in Kuwait

If you are a diabetes patient in Kuwait and are experiencing persistent symptoms such as frequent urination, increased thirst, unexplained weight loss, fatigue, or blurred vision, it is important to consult a specialist. These symptoms can indicate that your blood sugar levels are not being properly managed, and a healthcare professional can help you develop a treatment plan that works for you.

Additionally, if you have been diagnosed with diabetes and are not seeing improvements in your blood sugar levels despite following a treatment plan, it is crucial to seek further medical advice. Specialists can help you adjust your treatment plan, including insulin therapy, to better manage your blood sugar levels.

### Conclusion

Human insulin is a vital hormone for maintaining blood sugar levels. If you are a diabetes patient in Kuwait and are experiencing persistent symptoms or if your blood sugar levels are not being properly managed, it is important to consult a specialist. By working closely with your healthcare provider, you can develop a treatment plan that helps you manage your diabetes and maintain a healthy lifestyle.

---

Please review the final version quickly. I’ll be happy to make any necessary adjustments.
</response>
gts:
Insulin is a hormone produced by the pancreas and has many important functions in the human body, especially in controlling blood sugar levels and preventing high blood sugar. Insulin is a hormone that helps transport sugar from the blood to the cells in the body.

Insulin allows your body to use the sugar (glucose) in carbohydrates for energy or store glucose for future use. The most important function of insulin in the human body is its interaction with glucose, and thereby it enables the cells in the body to use glucose as energy for daily chores.

The more glucose in the blood, the more insulin the pancreas secretes. For the glucose in the blood to enter the cells, the pancreas produces insulin, which sends signals to the cells in the body to absorb the sugar into the blood. For people without diabetes, the pancreas produces enough insulin to remove a sugar called glucose from the blood, into the cells, and use it as energy. However, diabetes affects this process, which is why some diabetics need extra insulin.

But if someone has diabetes, either the body cannot produce insulin, or insulin does not work properly in the body. If you don’t have enough insulin, glucose builds up in your bloodstream instead of supplying energy to your body. In the absence of insulin, the body cannot use glucose as energy in cells. This is when you have to consult the diabetes doctors in Kuwait .

The World Health Organization guidelines recommend human insulin products for patients with type 1 diabetes who need cheap insulin options. Regular Human Insulin is used in conjunction with a proper diet and exercise program to help control high blood sugar levels in diabetic patients. Insulin is a hormone that regulates the amount of glucose (sugar) in the blood and is necessary for the normal functioning of the body.

gts:
Somebody pinch me I must be dreaming!

Our already very popular — Christmas Selection Box — was featured in British Vogue!

To appear in such a unique magazine truly is something special for any small business & we were absolutely delighted when first contacted by Vogue magazine.

So What Is Vogue Magazine?

Vogue is a monthly fashion and lifestyle magazine that covers many topics, including fashion, beauty, culture & living.

With some of the biggest celebrities in the world appearing on the Vogue magazine cover.

One of biggest British magazines with 861,000 monthly readers, In 2020 they hit there highest traffic month ever on Vogue.co.uk with more than 5 Million Readers and 44 Million Page Views. Vogue also has over 4 Million Instagram followers.

How Did We Get Featured In Vogue Magazine ?

Sat on the sofa late one night in September we received an email from a Associate Classified Sales Manager from British Vogue to say they had come across our brand online and that we would be the perfect fit to showcase on there upcoming luxury interiors advertorial that was being created for British Vogue.

To say we were shocked would be a understatement!!

We were then presented with the different options available to us about being featured in Vogue’s Grotto’ a showcase that is designed to feature a varied range of premium interiors companies providing inspiration across all aspects of Vogue’s ideal home.

We chose to appear in the December, January and February issues of the magazine & also on there digital Interiors showcase, Vogue Retail which is a subsection on Vogue.co.uk.

On the January Issue of Vogues front cover is Kristen McMenamy, indisputably the model of the moment, from her high-profile campaign and catwalk work, to her impactful cult Instagram account.

Little Miss Twiggie Twinkles Christmas Gifts For Her featured on the pages of Vogue’s Health Kick in this issue.

Gaining this amazing exposure by featuring in this unique magazine has given Little Miss Twiggie Twinkles a amazing boost! Not every company in the world can say

“ We Were Featured In Vogue “

With the February edition still to be released & being contacted by many of the other Conde` Nast magazines related to British Vogue the future is looking bright for our wax melt & gift shop based in the stunning Lake District.

With our ever growing range of highly scented wax melts, gift sets for all occasions & home fragrance products Little Miss Twiggie Twinkles is the one stop shop for all things that smell amazing!

Sure! Here’s a short article about Apple Music’s new approach to streaming royalties:

**Apple Music’s New Approach to Streaming Royalties: A Closer Look**

Apple Music has recently announced a new approach to streaming royalties, setting a new standard in the music industry. Unlike competitors like Spotify, which charges $0.008 to $0.004 cents per stream, Apple Music offers a flat rate of $0.01 per stream. This move is seen as a significant shift in the industry, reflecting Apple’s commitment to fair compensation for artists and songwriters.

Apple’s approach is designed to be more transparent and equitable. By charging a consistent rate, Apple aims to simplify royalty calculations and reduce the complexity that can arise from different pricing structures. This transparency is particularly important for artists and songwriters, who can now more easily understand and manage their earnings from streaming services.

In addition to the royalty rate, Apple Music has also introduced a new feature called “DJ Mix Tracking.” This allows users to create and share custom DJ mixes, which are then credited to the DJ and the artists featured in the mix. This innovative feature not only enhances the user experience but also provides a new revenue stream for artists.

It’s worth noting that Apple Music has already launched a Portuguese version, which is available to users in Portugal. However, for now, the English version is the focus of this article.

Overall, Apple Music’s new approach to streaming royalties is a step forward in the industry, offering a more straightforward and fair system for artists and songwriters. As the music industry continues to evolve, it’s clear that Apple is at the forefront of these changes, setting a new standard for the future of streaming.
</response>

clique aqui para ler a versão em português

The issues streaming services face in regard to the fair attribution of music to rights holders and appropriate revenue distribution have been well-documented. There may be new possibilities on the horizon, though.

Having purchased Shazam, a smartphone app focused on music recognition, Apple Music announced in September that it would begin identifying songs in DJ mixes in order to pass royalties on to all involved; mixes made by common users are still off the radar for now.

The platform was already carving a different path to its competitors regarding its remuneration structure. While the company pays $0.01 per play, other names in the industry, like Spotify, continue to pay only fractions of a cent.

To trace future trends is a difficult task. Apple Music may be playing a pioneering role in proposing these new dynamics for Streaming platforms, after all, the mechanism used by Shazam can be replicated by the rest of the industry. But will these other companies have any interest or feel any obligation to do so? It is certainly an expectation of rights holders. We will have to wait and see.

Sure! Here’s a draft for your article on a quick cleaning trick for glass and hand blenders:

**Quick Cleaning Trick for Glass and Hand Blenders**

Cleaning your blender can be a tedious task, especially during busy holiday periods when you’re juggling multiple dishes. However, with a few simple steps, you can keep your blender sparkling clean in no time.

**For Glass Blenders:**
1. **Disassemble:** Start by disassembling your blender. Remove the blades, the base, and any other removable parts.
2. **Soak:** Place all parts in a large bowl of warm, soapy water. Let them soak for about 15 minutes.
3. **Scrub:** Use a soft brush to scrub the blades and base. Pay special attention to any stubborn spots.
4. **Rinse:** Rinse all parts thoroughly under running water.
5. **Dry:** Dry the blender parts with a clean towel and store them in a dry place.

**For Hand Blenders:**
1. **Disassemble:** Similar to glass blenders, disassemble your hand blender.
2. **Soak:** Soak the parts in warm, soapy water for about 10 minutes.
3. **Scrub:** Use a soft sponge or brush to scrub the blades and base.
4. **Rinse:** Rinse all parts under running water.
5. **Dry:** Dry the parts with a clean towel and store them in a dry place.

**Additional Tips:**
- **Prevent Clogging:** To prevent clogs, always clean your blender after each use, especially if you’re blending ingredients like nuts or seeds.
- **Regular Maintenance:** Regularly cleaning your blender can extend its lifespan and keep it performing at its best.

By following these simple steps, you can keep your blender clean and ready for the next holiday baking session. Happy cooking!
</response>

It is a trick specially designed for glass mixers, but it can be used in any type of mixer, also in hand blenders. **Pediatric Dentists: Specialists in Children’s Dental Care**

Pediatric dentists are dental professionals who specialize in providing comprehensive care for children from infancy through adolescence. They play a crucial role in preventing tooth decay and promoting overall oral health. Pediatric dentists offer a range of services, including:

Pediatricians are medical doctors who specialize in the care of infants, children, and adolescents.

Pediatricians provide advice on immunization, dieting requirements, exercise requirements for kids, and more. They also provide thorough examination of the children to detect any abnormalities or deficiencies.

A pediatrician is a doctor who specializes in the care of infants, children and adolescents. They provide advice on immunization requirements, dieting requirements, exercise requirements for kids and more. They also provide thorough examinations of each child to detect any abnormalities or deficiencies that may be present at birth or develop after birth.

Preventing Tooth Decay with Regular Checkups

Tooth decay is caused by sugars left in your mouth that turn into an acid, which can break down your teeth. Children are at high risk for tooth decay for a simple reason: many children and adolescents do not practice regular, good oral hygiene habits. Proper brushing and flossing routines combined with regular dental visits help keep tooth decay away.

Your child should visit the dentist every six months for regular dental cleanings and checkups. We recommend fluoride treatments twice a year along with cleanings to keep teeth their strongest. Tooth sealants are also recommended because they “seal” the deep grooves in your child’s teeth, preventing decay from forming in these hard-to-reach areas. Sealants last for several years, but will be monitored at your child’s regular checkups.

**Raffles vs. Lotteries: Understanding the Differences**

Raffles and lotteries are both forms of random selection, but they differ significantly in terms of rewards, exclusivity, and historical examples.

**Rewards**
Raffles typically offer more substantial rewards compared to lotteries. For instance, the Townsend Duryea yacht raffle in 1900 offered a yacht valued at $10,000, while a typical lottery might offer a modest cash prize of $100 or less.

**Exclusivity**
Raffles often have a fixed number of players who are eligible to participate in the draw. This exclusivity can make raffles more exclusive and desirable. For example, the Montclair Art Museum’s art portrait raffle limited the number of entries to 100, ensuring that each participant had a high chance of winning.

**Historical Examples**
- **Townsend Duryea Yacht Raffle (1900)**: The Townsend Duryea Yacht Raffle was a significant event in yacht racing history. It offered a yacht valued at $10,000 to the winner, with a fixed number of 100 participants.
- **Montclair Art Museum’s Art Portrait Raffle (2015)**: The Montclair Art Museum held a raffle for a portrait of a local artist. Only 100 people were allowed to enter, ensuring that each participant had a high chance of winning.

In contrast, lotteries often have a much larger number of participants and offer smaller prizes. The exclusivity of raffles makes them more appealing to those who seek a higher chance of winning significant rewards.

gts:
Have you ever googled how to write a resume, and found beautifully written phrases that sound so impactful…it’s just using them verbatim, feels…kind of…unauthentic…you wonder if everyone’s resume looks like this and if yours will even stand out.

Photo by Zoltan Tasi on Unsplash

I’ll be honest with you, having a resume filled with well-crafted sentences that you didn’t write and have no substance behind them, will NOT catch the attention of your future employer. Using only a combination of buzzwords is not an effective way to get shortlisted for an interview.

It is not the use of buzzwords per se that is the problem, it is using them without supporting evidence (your experiences). The following task will guide you in re-creating an impactful skill statement that is personalized by you, for you and about you. Cool?

But I don’t have any good experiences…

First get a pen and paper, keyboard, typewriter, whichever you feel most comfortable using (I often start by writing, and once my ideas start to take shape, I transition to typing).

Start by answering the below questions. This exercise will take some time and dedicated thought. However, it is well worth it. I continue to use this process to update my resumes. The aim is to dissect your experiences to uncover your capabilities. Employers want insights into your behaviours, and behaviours are just buzzwords without the work experience evidence.

The more specific you are with the below, the more unique and personalized your skill statements will be.
